programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Betrayed by her evil sister Ravenna, heartbroken Freya retreats to a northern kingdom to raise an army of huntsmen as her protectors. Gifted with the ability to freeze her enemies in ice, Freya teaches her young soldiers to never fall in love. When Eric and fellow warrior Sara defy this rule, the angry queen does whatever she can to stop them. As war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara try to end Ravenna's wicked reign.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kraven's complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: It's been nearly a decade since Tarzan, also known as John Clayton III, left Africa to live in Victorian England with his wife Jane. Danger lurks on the horizon as Leon Rom, a treacherous envoy for King Leopold, devises a scheme that lures the couple to the Congo. Rom plans to capture Tarzan and deliver him to an old enemy in exchange for diamonds. When Jane becomes a pawn in his devious plot, Tarzan must return to the jungle to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A widowed farmer, with a brave but brutal military past, decides not to join up when the British arrive in 1776. However, when his son enlists and is later captured by the enemy, the former soldier must abandon his new-found pacifist principles in order to rescue his oldest child, and forms a regiment of Carolina patriots, whose guerrilla tactics prove pivotal to the US war effort.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgement by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: Gunner is a special forces soldier who returns to the field of battle to save his kidnapped niece in South America. He and his team soon discover that her disappearance is part of a corrupt private operation that hits way too close to home.

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: The notorious Kowloon Walled City serves as a fortified, lawless safe haven for gangs and refugees alike. But when a skilled underground fighter runs afoul of the most feared Triad boss in Hong Kong, a bounty is placed on his head.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Antiheroes
programme.desc: From `Dirty Harry' and `The Godfather' to the deeply imperfect gang from the `Fast and the Furious' franchise, this Cinema List celebrates our favourite anti-heroes.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: It's been nearly a decade since Tarzan, also known as John Clayton III, left Africa to live in Victorian England with his wife Jane. Danger lurks on the horizon as Leon Rom, a treacherous envoy for King Leopold, devises a scheme that lures the couple to the Congo. Rom plans to capture Tarzan and deliver him to an old enemy in exchange for diamonds. When Jane becomes a pawn in his devious plot, Tarzan must return to the jungle to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: The curse of an ancient mummy protects buried treasure in the Egyptian desert. An American mercenary who knows of the secret location is rescued from a Cairo prison by an English historian and her brother, and together they set off on a hunt. Along the way, the trio encounter flesh-eating scarab beetles, killer sandstorms, and reincarnated demons.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hair's-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Jurassic
programme.desc: Welcome to a Cinema List 65 million years in the making, going through the very best moments from the Jurassic franchise - from the 1993 original to `Jurassic World: Dominion'.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Though the Nazis fail to open the gates of Hell, one little devil gets through. Raised at a secret FBI lab, Hellboy is a cigar-chomping, crimson demon with a breezeblock for a right hand and a gift for fighting otherworldly beasts. Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice looks unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Doc's violent, bank-robbing cronies, including Buddy, Bats and Darling, get in and out of Dodge before it's too late. He's not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: The curse of an ancient mummy protects buried treasure in the Egyptian desert. An American mercenary who knows of the secret location is rescued from a Cairo prison by an English historian and her brother, and together they set off on a hunt. Along the way, the trio encounter flesh-eating scarab beetles, killer sandstorms, and reincarnated demons.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: The evil mummy Imhotep returns to wreak havoc as he resumes his relentless search for power and immortality. To make matters worse, another ancient evil has been unleashed, even more dangerous than Imhotep. Only the heroic Rick O'Connell and his intrepid Egyptologist wife stand in the way of these twin terrors as they embark upon a desperate mission to save the world.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hair's-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: An ex-hit man is injected with a mysterious cocktail of drugs by his arch-rival that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level. Hurtling through a succession of sex and violence in order to keep his pulse rate up, he must seek revenge and keep himself and his girlfriend alive.

programme.title: Seeking Justice
programme.desc: Quiet teacher Will Gerard is sucked into a world of vigilantism when his wife Laura is brutally attacked.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: As Mount Vesuvius rains down lava and ash, a gladiator races to save the woman he loves before the city collapses.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Antiheroes
programme.desc: From `Dirty Harry' and `The Godfather' to the deeply imperfect gang from the `Fast and the Furious' franchise, this Cinema List celebrates our favourite anti-heroes.

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Following the death of his friend, Bobby decides to leave the army, but he is soon asked to come back into action in order to help prevent the assassination of the President.

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice looks unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution.

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: The cynical commander of Allied Nations forces has to prevent a warlord from taking over the world. With 63 hostages held in his seemingly impregnable fortress, the warlord is demanding an outrageously hefty ransom.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on the botched mission during America's military involvement in Somalia in the early 1990s. An attempt by US Army Rangers parachuted into Mogadishu to capture a warlord's two top lieutenants goes disastrously wrong when two helicopters are shot down.

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Following the death of his friend, Bobby decides to leave the army, but he is soon asked to come back into action in order to help prevent the assassination of the President.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In a time before the pyramids, an evil king threatens to take over the world, so the leaders of the remaining tribes under threat call upon a desert warrior to help them defeat the wicked one and his brutal hordes. As the warrior battles against the evil around him, he is preparing for a final showdown that will decide if it is to be his destiny to become the great Scorpion King.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old man's notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: The cynical commander of Allied Nations forces has to prevent a warlord from taking over the world. With 63 hostages held in his seemingly impregnable fortress, the warlord is demanding an outrageously hefty ransom.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland Deschain, is the last Gunslinger standing. He has a grave responsibility, it is up to him to prevent the Man in Black from toppling the Dark Tower, the key that holds the universe together.

programme.title: Live: Good Morning Football
programme.desc: NFL Network enters the morning show fray with a three-hour live presentation. Each day, "Good Morning Football" brings viewers up-to-the-minute breaking NFL news and local NFL stories on a national platform. The show features a combination of headline-making interviews and a discussion of a wide array of issues in the areas of sports, news and entertainment. By booking celebrity guests and opinionated national and local journalists -- and taking advantage of a close collaboration with all 32 NFL franchises -- "Good Morning Football" breaks out within and well beyond its time period.

programme.title: NFL Fantasy Live
programme.desc: Millions of NFL fans live in a fantasy world where survival depends on successfully navigating the twists and turns of a grueling season. After all, relying on a second-string quarterback or an untested wide receiver to come up big is usually foolhardy. Avoiding such predicaments takes plenty of preparation, and that's where "NFL Fantasy Live" comes into play. Host Marcas Grant provides the advice and analysis fantasy fans need to make winning lineup decisions. And being armed with the latest player updates, stats and trends goes a long way toward turning fantasies into championships.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Young Winston
programme.desc: Lavish rendering of Winston Churchill's early life, from his school days, through his adventures in Africa, to his first days in Parliament. It begins with Churchill as a junior officer in India out to make a name for himself. It is suggested that becoming a war correspondent would be a good career move. His colourful, often controversial, reports make him a household name, aiding his passage into politics.

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: A lovable Catholic priest sets out to retrieve the priceless cross stolen by a thief named Flambeau during a trip to Rome. However, Father Brown is not an ordinary churchman, and the thief meets his match.

programme.title: Time Lock
programme.desc: Modest in scale only, this gripping rescue drama reeks of sweat-soaked claustrophobia and suspense. Peter Dawson heads a team of experts, doctors and welders racing against the clock to save a six-year-old boy who's been trapped in a seemingly impregnable bank vault.

programme.title: The Black Arrow
programme.desc: Richard Shelton returns victorious from the War of the Roses only to discover that his father has been murdered.

programme.title: Hunter Killer
programme.desc: American submarine Captain Joe Glass is on the hunt for a U.S. sub in distress in the Arctic Ocean. He soon learns that a secret Russian coup is in the offing, a conspiracy that threatens to dismantle the world order. With crew and country on the line, Glass must assemble an elite group of Navy SEALs to sneak through enemy waters, rescue the kidnapped Russian president and prevent World War III.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: A young and impetuous naval lieutenant and a more experienced officer are given the job of defending two marines accused of murder. As the two officers come to terms with one another, their investigation uncovers some sinister secrets and collusion at the highest level. The marines' commanding officer certainly has no intention of making the truth public.

programme.title: Overlord
programme.desc: Paratroopers drop behind enemy lines to penetrate a fortified church and destroy a Nazi transmitter. Making their way to an underground lab, the soldiers stumble upon a sinister experiment that forces them into a battle against an army of the undead.

programme.title: I Am Not a Witch
programme.desc: The first child is taken to a travelling witch camp, where she is told that she should cut the ribbon and attempt to escape. Crossing the witches is a bad idea and she risks being cursed and transformed into a goat.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Fire Down Below
programme.desc: Tony and Felix own a tramp boat and run jobs for people in the Caribbean. When they agree to transport the mysterious Irena to another island it drives a wedge between them and Tony swears vengeance against Felix for stealing her. However, Felix has other ideas.

programme.title: The Moonraker
programme.desc: In 17th-century England, Charles Stuart rallies a group of supporters in opposition to Oliver Cromwell's Roundheads.

programme.title: Saraband for Dead Lovers
programme.desc: A star-crossed romance develops between an unhappily married princess and a Swedish nobleman.

programme.title: The Wackiest Ship in the Army
programme.desc: A luckless naval Lieutenant is duped into commanding a dangerous mission into enemy territory during the Bismarck Sea Battle, but his boat is barely shipshape, and his crew turns out to be a bunch of wise-cracking landlubbers.

programme.title: Dog
programme.desc: With a dog named Lulu by his side, Army Ranger Briggs races down the Pacific Coast to make it to a soldier's funeral on time. Along the way, Briggs and Lulu drive each other completely crazy, break a handful of laws and narrowly evade death.

programme.title: Déjà Vu
programme.desc: Déjà vu is what unexpectedly guides agent Doug Carlin through an investigation into a crime. After an explosion in New Orleans, Doug is called to check and recover the evidence, but Carlin's enquiries uncover a connection between the bomb accelerant and the body of a local girl named Claire Kuchever. Things become even stranger when Doug hears his own voice on Claire's answering machine.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: In a Mexico City wracked by a recent wave of kidnappings, ex-CIA operative John Creasy reluctantly accepts a job as a bodyguard for 9-year-old Lupita, the daughter of wealthy businessman Samuel Ramos. Just as Creasy begins to develop a fondness for the young girl, a bloodthirsty gunman kidnaps her. Now, Creasy must pick off a succession of corrupt cops and criminals to reach his ultimate object of vengeance.

programme.title: Hush
programme.desc: On a night-time motorway journey, young couple Zakes and Beth catch a horrifying glimpse of a young woman imprisoned in the back of a truck. When the two stop at a service station, Beth goes missing and a terrified Zakes races to track her down, fearing she has become the driver's next victim.

programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Dragonball Evolution
programme.desc: The young warrior Son Goku sets out on a quest, racing against time and the vengeful King Piccolo, to collect a set of seven magical orbs that will grant their wielder unlimited power.

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: On a day like no other, the wealthy Cotwell couple's baby boy scrambles unaccompanied across the bustling cityscapes of Chicago, with three slow-witted kidnappers on his tail.

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: A boy discovers he is `The Seeker', the last in a line of time-travelling peacekeepers who must fight against the evil Dark.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Bitten by a radioactive spider, teenager Miles Morales suddenly develops mysterious powers that transform him into Spider-Man. He must now use his newfound skills to battle the evil Kingpin, a hulking madman who can open portals to other universes.

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: Henry Brogan is an elite 51-year-old assassin who's ready to call it quits after completing his 72nd job. His plans get turned upside down when he becomes the target of a mysterious operative who can seemingly predict his every move. To his horror, Brogan soon learns that the man who's trying to kill him is a younger, faster, cloned version of himself.

After crashing on an unknown planet, two survivors quickly discover they're actually stranded on Earth, 65 million years ago. With only one chance at a rescue, they must make their way across an unknown terrain riddled with prehistoric creatures.

programme.title: The Black Phone
programme.desc: Finney is a 13-year-old boy who's being held captive in a soundproof basement by a sadistic, masked killer. When a disconnected phone on the wall starts to ring, he soon discovers that he can hear the voices of the murderer's previous victims.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: Haunting tale which centres on a young girl who has been murdered and watches over her family - and her killer - from heaven. She must weigh her desire for vengeance against her desire for her family to heal.

programme.title: Barnacle Bill
programme.desc: The comic tale of a failed sailor who sparks jealousies in a seaside community when he strikes it big in the end-of-the-pier entertainment trade. programme.title: Little Bone Lodge
programme.desc: During a vicious storm, two criminal brothers on the run seek refuge in a desolate farmhouse. Taking the resident family captive, they discover that the house holds dark secrets of its own.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: Bank clerk Freddie graduates from collecting butterflies to collecting girls. Only one girl can match wits with him. This quietly chilling film is based on the novel by John Fowles.

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the house's secrets and end the bloodshed.

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: Attacked by an unseen animal, Blake and his family barricade themselves inside a farmhouse as the creature prowls the perimeter. As the night stretches on, however, he begins to behave strangely, transforming into something unrecognizable.

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate. Together, they uncover the order's unholy secret. Risking not only their lives but their faith and their very souls, they confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

programme.title: The Damned
programme.desc: Fighting for survival at an isolated fishing outpost, Eva and her crew are cursed after making the choice to not help a sinking ship off the coast. Facing the consequences, a darkness consumes them all, creating chaos and death at every turn.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: The Exorcist
programme.desc: A famous actress calls upon medical science for help when her daughter begins behaving strangely, but without any success. Then, as bizarre and horrific incidents involving the daughter increase, her mother turns in desperation to the Church, and to a priest who doubts his own faith.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A séance scam leads to terror when an evil spirit possesses a widow's youngest daughter in 1967 Los Angeles.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process can't be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.title: Little Bone Lodge
programme.desc: During a vicious storm, two criminal brothers on the run seek refuge in a desolate farmhouse. Taking the resident family captive, they discover that the house holds dark secrets of its own.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the house's secrets and end the bloodshed.

programme.title: Salem's Lot
programme.desc: A writer returns to his hometown and discovers that the residents are being turned into vampires.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British family's idyllic country estate.

programme.title: Salem's Lot
programme.desc: A writer returns to his hometown and discovers that the residents are being turned into vampires.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8 mm `snuff' films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.

programme.title: IT
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the town's children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British family's idyllic country estate.

programme.title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
programme.desc: Count Dracula, a 15th-century prince, is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Dracula's castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harker's fiancée, Mina, the spitting image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.title: Cinema List: Thrilling Thriller
programme.desc: Send your heart racing with these masterful thrillers creating tension so thick you could cut it, from 70s hit `The China Syndrome' to M Night Shyamalan's 2024 blockbuster `Trap'.

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic warriors must rely on their wits and weapons more than ever as they find themselves in a relentless battle against smarter, faster and seemingly indestructible zombies.

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: A desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in some 45,000 years ago. As they start to realise that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.title: IT
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the town's children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8 mm `snuff' films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic warriors must rely on their wits and weapons more than ever as they find themselves in a relentless battle against smarter, faster and seemingly indestructible zombies.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: The US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: John thinks he's found the perfect gift for his expectant wife, Mia: a vintage doll in a white dress. But one terrible night, devil worshippers invade their home and try to summon a demon, turning the doll into a conduit for ultimate evil.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Years after the tragic death of their daughter, a former toy maker and his wife welcome a nun and six orphaned girls into their farmhouse. Terror soon strikes when one child finds a seemingly innocent doll that appears to have a life of its own.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: It's been 40 years since Laurie Strode survived a vicious attack from crazed killer Michael Myers on Halloween night. She now faces a terrifying showdown when the masked madman returns to Haddonfield, Illinois, but this time, Laurie's ready for him.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: When a family's pet cat is killed, they manage to resurrect the animal by placing it in an Indian burial ground which is believed to revive the dead. However, in doing so, they create a monster.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process can't be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: The US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sant's remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcock's day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A séance scam leads to terror when an evil spirit possesses a widow's youngest daughter in 1967 Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss' Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth'. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Liberty's head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force that's far beyond her control.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sant's remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcock's day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: Bram Stoker's Dracula

Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Dracula's castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harker's fiancée, Mina, the spitting image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: Bank clerk Freddie graduates from collecting butterflies to collecting girls. Only one girl can match wits with him. This quietly chilling film is based on the novel by John Fowles.

programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement, a former baseball player moves into a new house with his wife and two children. Soon, a dark secret from the home's past unleashes a malevolent force that drags the family into the depths of inescapable terror.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil

Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process can't be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sant's remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcock's day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who murdered five people, apparently at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of US soldiers.

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: Based on the true story of policeman Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD. Going beyond the call of duty, he is rewarded for his commitment.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: When a string of brutal murders terrorises London, it does not take long for legendary detective Sherlock Holmes and his crime-solving partner, Dr Watson, to find the killer, Lord Blackwood. A devotee of the dark arts, Blackwood has a bigger scheme in mind, and his execution plays right into his plans. The game is afoot when Blackwood seems to rise from the grave, plunging Holmes and Watson into the world of the occult and strange technologies.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The murder of Austria's crown prince leads Holmes, Watson and a Gypsy to a showdown with an evil genius named Moriarty.

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: New York City cab driver Travis Bickle constantly reflects on the ugly corruption of life around him, and becomes increasingly disturbed over his own loneliness and alienation. In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances before funnelling the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sant's remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcock's day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: Ruthless
programme.desc: A high school coach hunts down the men responsible for an underground human trafficking operation.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A murder in Paris' Louvre Museum and cryptic clues in some of Leonardo da Vinci's most famous paintings lead to the discovery of a religious mystery. For 2,000 years a secret society closely guards information that -- should it come to light -- could rock the very foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, a Harvard symbologist is surprised to be approached by the Pope's emissaries for help. Following the Pope's recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiff's place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the world's population.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the world's population.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances before funnelling the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: Dapper Danny Ocean is a man of action. Less than 24 hours into his parole from a New Jersey penitentiary, the wry, charismatic thief is already rolling out his next plan. He follows three rules: do not hurt anybody, do not steal from anyone who does not deserve it, and play the game like you have got nothing to lose. With those in mind, Danny works to orchestrate the most sophisticated, elaborate casino heist in history, targeting three establishments owned by the man who is dating his ex-wife.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: Based on the true story of policeman Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD. Going beyond the call of duty, he is rewarded for his commitment.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier jeopardises his relationship by accidentally calling his girlfriend by an ex-lover's name, and Daphne panics after losing a valuable keepsake.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Three previously featured bosses ask employees to go undercover for a second look inside their organisations.

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary [NEW]
programme.desc: Channel 4's midday news summary.

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: In Italy a B&B opens its doors to test guests, while in Spain a woman takes her coach trippers on a catamaran. In France, a family struggle to get a gite renovated, and a couple in Spain find their bar and B&B business seriously short of staff.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Simon O'Brien and Henry Cole visit Witney in Oxfordshire. Henry comes across a tractor which hasn't run for quite a few years, but it's no problem for restorer Alan, the mechanical medic.

programme.title: Countdown [NEW]
programme.desc: Colin Murray, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent host, with Maggie Aderin-Pocock in Dictionary Corner, as contestants race against the clock to pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Craig Rowe's helping Claire from Bedfordshire find a holiday home in the heart of Mallorca's capital, Palma. Claire has a budget of £190,000 and Craig has five great properties to show her.

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village [NEW]
programme.desc: There's delicate demolition at Jonas and Ulrike's Transylvanian village, as a dilapidated church organ gets a makeover. In Bulgaria, strict Brexit rules threaten to derail Kate's journey. In France, Lolly and Sean welcome family to their manoir.

programme.title: Four in a Bed [NEW]
programme.desc: Sue and Roger host the week's final visit at Tedstone Log Cabins, their hand-crafted huts in Herefordshire, where Roger ends up licking his lips in anticipation of payment day.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Student Stance hosts the penultimate day. His guests aren't expecting much from him, but he's planning to surprise them with a menu based on his Lebanese and Persian heritage. With a little help from mum! Will it be enough to win him the grand?

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: In Málaga, the Hamiltons help over-analytic economists Sally and Andrew choose a dream property using their hearts as well as their heads. In Almería, Shaun Garner helps Vishal search for a holiday home for the whole family.

programme.title: Channel 4 News [NEW]

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off: An Extra Slice

programme.title: Mitchell and Webb Are Not Helping

programme.title: Plus belle la vie, encore plus belle
programme.desc: Le coupable de la tentative de meurtre révèle ses motivations. Barbara invite Luna, Blanche et Jennifer à une virée au restaurant. A la résidence, Nisma prend une décision qu'elle partage avec Apolline. Thomas croit que Riva a replongé, mais Léa lui fait une révélation surprenante. Patrick a toujours du mal à trouver sa place et Mirta et Yolande organisent une formation premiers secours. Plusieurs acteurs de "Plus belle la vie" reprennent leur personnage dans cette suite qui se place dans la continuité directe de la première série Au bord du désespoir, les meilleures ennemies élaborent un plan de la dernière chance. Soucieuse, Barbara se confie à Thomas au sujet de Jennifer. De son côté, Morgane espère que son cadeau pourra apaiser l'animosité de Laura.. programme.desc: Depuis le Parc des Princes de Paris, France.

programme.title: Football : Eliminatoires de la Coupe du monde (UEFA) : France v Azerbaïdjan
programme.desc: Avec deux victoires en autant de rencontres, face à l'Ukraine et à l'Islande, la France a pris la tête du groupe D. Pour leur troisième match des éliminatoires de la Coupe du monde 2026, les Bleus de Didier Deschamps accueillent l'Azerbaïdjan au Parc des Princes, avec l'ambition de décrocher un nouveau succès qui conforterait leur place de leader et les rapprocherait d'une qualification avant leur déplacement en Islande. Mais les vice-champions du monde devront se méfier d'une équipe azerbaïdjanaise récemment remaniée : son sélectionneur, Fernando Santos, a en effet été évincé début septembre, après le lourd revers subi en Islande (0-5).

programme.title: Vendredi tout est permis avec Arthur
programme.desc: Les personnalités invitées se livrent à une multitude d'épreuves délirantes autour d'Arthur.

programme.title: Vendredi, tout est permis avec Crédeville
programme.desc: Les personnalités du paysage audiovisuel français craignent cette invitation qu'ils ne peuvent refuser en dépit des risques encourus : se retrouver dans les images drôles des zappings durant des années. En effet, les invités n'ignorent pas que Gérémy Crédeville, qui prend les rennes de cette émission culte, s'apprête à les placer dans des situations aussi incongrues qu'hilarantes.

programme.title: Turning Point With Dr. David Jeremiah
programme.desc: In this weekly program, Dr. David Jeremiah delivers practical messages to the congregation at the Shadow Mountain Community Church in San Diego. Also featured is music from the Shadow Mountain Community Church Choir and Orchestra, as well as performances by musical guests that have included Steve Green and Charles Billingsley. Men and women who have been impacted by the Turning Point ministry also share their stories with viewers. During the month of December, "Turning Point" usually features special Christmas programming.

programme.title: Life Today With James Robison
programme.desc: James Robison is a former preacher who changed directions in his life several years ago and began hosting this television show alongside his wife, Betty, in order to reach out to help more people. This daily religious and self-help program welcomes guests who tell how they have successfully overcome difficulties in their lives by following God's word -- with the hope of encouraging others to do the same and look to God for help and guidance in times of need. The Robisons provide viewers with Bible-based advice to help them deal with everyday problems.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: The European Poker Tour celebrates its 20th anniversary in Barcelona, the city where it all began. Nearly 2,000 players compete in the Main Event for a €1.5m first prize. EPT legends return to the tables and reigning champ Simon Wiciak looks to defend his title.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Day 2 of the European Poker Tour Main Event continues, with PSPC champion Ramon Colillas, the USA's Rania Nasreddine and Canada's Griffin Benger among the players hoping to survive the session and stay in contention for the title, trophy and €1.5m top prize.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: They're on the bubble in the European Poker Tour Main Event. The next six players to be eliminated will leave with nothing. The rest will be guaranteed a slice of the €9.5m prize pool. Can YouTube star Wolfgang Poker and Canadian pro Griffin Benger make it into the money?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: At the European Poker Tour's 20th anniversary celebrations, there's a throwback vibe in the Main Event. A player calling himself 'The Eliminator' is holding court at the feature table. Expect banter and bluffs, as this old school character competes for the €1.5m first prize.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Survival is the name of the game, with just over 100 players remaining in the European Poker Tour Main Event. Most of the €9.5m prize pool is still up for grabs, and reigning champ Simon Wiciak and Monte-Carlo finalist Rania Nasreddine can both make EPT history.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: There's €1.5m for the winner of this special anniversary edition of the European Poker Tour. As Day 4 of the Main Event continues, the USA's Rania Nasreddine is put through the wringer and a new generation of poker talent starts to make its mark.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Only 40 players remain in the European Poker Tour Main Event, including reigning champion Simon Wiciak. Can the French pro go back-to-back? The competition is tough: chip leader Stephen Song and Monte-Carlo finalist Rania Nasreddine are also eyeing the €1.5m top prize.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: In the late stages of this European Poker Tour Main Event, mistakes are starting to creep in. But there's no margin for error, with millions still on the line. Among the final 23 are American pro Stephen Song and former EPT finalist Rania Nasreddine.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: All eyes are on the USA's Rania Nasreddine, as she tries to make back-to-back European Poker Tour final tables. Brazilian pro Fabiano Kovalski is another previous EPT finalist looking for a second chance at victory. The top prize in this tournament is €1.5m.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Nine remain in the Main Event. Two are on course to make history. One will be crowned champion and earn $1.5m. The USA's Stephen Song and Rania Nasreddine are among the players battling chip leader Fabiano Kovalski for supremacy.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: It's the final table of the Main Event and the conclusion of the European Poker Tour's 20th anniversary celebrations. Three American players, including Rania Nasreddine, are among the final six. Who will lift the trophy and earn the first prize of $1.5m?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Super High Roller (SHR)-The €100,000 Super High Roller reaches its climactic finale with six elite players vying for nearly €1.4 million. Leading the pack is 2015 Monte Carlo Main Event champion Adrian Mateos, facing off against poker heavyweights Mikita Badziakouski, László Bujtas, and Marius Gierse, plus wildcards Kent Staahle and Mikalai Vaskaboinikau. With life-changing money on the line, who will claim the prestigious title?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 1 (ME1)-After a three-year hiatus, the prestigious EPT Monte Carlo €5,000 Main Event returns in spectacular fashion. Day 2 brings together poker's biggest names, including high-stakes specialist Patrik Antonius, World Champion Koray Aldemir, Italian ace Mustapha Kanit, and trailblazing two-time EPT champion Victoria Coren-Mitchell. The battle for poker immortality begins.

programme.title: The Comeback with Craig Carton
programme.desc: Craig Carton sits down with those who have experienced the highs and lows of gambling addiction to amplify their stories, break down the stigma surrounding gambling disorder, raise awareness of support resources for individuals and their families, and show that recovery is possible.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 2 (ME2)-Tension mounts as the money bubble approaches in Monte Carlo's Main Event. With 159 players set to cash for at least €8,690, every decision matters. EPT legends Patrik Antonius and Davidi Kitai command the feature table while 2019 PSPC champion Ramon Colillas holds the chip lead. Who will survive the bubble and who will go home empty-handed?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 3 (ME3)-The money bubble has burst, but for seasoned pro Ole Schemion-who has earned over $5 million in Monte Carlo alone-a minimum cash isn't enough. He faces a formidable challenge from French star Gaëlle Baumann and online legend Jussi Nevanlinna at the feature table. With real money now guaranteed, the gloves come off.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 4 (ME4)-PSPC champion Ramon Colillas surges into the top five as just 40 players remain in the EPT Monte Carlo Main Event. Day 3 intensifies as competitors battle to reach the final two tables. With the finish line in sight, who has what it takes to keep their championship dreams alive?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 5 (ME5)-The field narrows to just 16 survivors, including EPT Dublin champion Niall Farrell and PSPC winner Ramon Colillas. With over €41,000 already locked up, the stakes couldn't be higher as players fight for their place at the final table of nine. Every hand could be the difference between glory and heartbreak.

programme.desc: When the four ninja follow the mysterious falcon into the woods, they stumble on a hidden work shop where Zane learns the secret about his past and in the process, finally knowing who he is, he is the first ninja to unlock his true potential.

programme.title: Marvel Black Panther Trouble in Wakanda
programme.desc: Being the King of Wakanda is tough -- especially when you're also the Black Panther! When Thanos arrives from outer space and threatens to destroy Earth, the Black Panther leaps into action and defeats him with the help of Earth's Mightiest Heroes. But the situation only gets worse when rogue villains Killmonger and Klaue team up with the Mad Titan to take the fight to Black Panther's homeland! Can the Panther pounce on their perilous plan before Wakanda is pulverized?

programme.title: The Maze Of Amazement
programme.desc: The Knights find themselves trapped in a maze looking for the Book of Deception. But will they actually get their hands on it, or will it keep deceiving them? The Knights travel to the Hill Country in the northern part of Knighton to Axl's home town of DIGGINGTON (where they realize that all of Axl's family look just like him.) While they're there, Merlok 2.0 detects something…one of the Magic Books! It's “The Book of Deception.” They go to find it and discover it ended up under a mountain. And, to make matters worse, the magic book has built a maze around itself to keep it from being found (it is deceptive!) As the NEXO-Knights enter the maze from one side, Jestro enters from the other the Book of Monsters has led him to the maze to get The Book of Deception, too. It's a race through this confusing maze to see who can get the book first. Ava figures out the maze is the Whackman maze from a videogame. After help from Axl's people to defeat Jestro and win the book, the knights discover

programme.title: The Hundred Year Moon
programme.desc: At the night of the Hundred Year Moon, the Wolves are running wild and causing havoc. Crooler kidnaps a young gorilla girl to lure Laval, Eris and Gorzan the Gorilla out to rescue her. It is a very dangerous night, but finally Skinnet the Skunk's foul odor may prove useful.

programme.title: Fish Story!
programme.desc: Vic and Owen find themselves, along with Sinjin, in the middle of a massive dino-fight in the old Jurassic Park Visitor Center.

programme.title: Snow Way
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all – the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: Their Draconic Majesty's Request
programme.desc: The mystery bounty hunter tracks Ras and Arin to the World Forest, while the Ninja search for the last Prismatic Blade.

programme.title: Crashing Together
programme.desc: Arin must choose between Ras and the Ninja as the battle for the Prismatic Blades rages across the World Forest.

programme.title: Beasts And Dragons, Rise Of Garmadon
programme.desc: Zane, Jay, and Kai remember some of Ninjago's fearsome creatures so that Cole defend the cave from an unidentified monster. But Ninja confront memories of their greatest villain and ally, Garmadon, before the threat to Zane controls him completely.

programme.title: Pteranodon't!
programme.desc: A young park guest accidentally strands himself in the Pteranodon aviary, requiring Owen and a testy Stygimoloch to stage a daring rescue.

programme.title: A Tale of Two Teos
programme.desc: Mateo and Zoey are captured by the Night Hunter and must free Z-Blob to rescue their friends at Castle Nocturnia from a terrible fate.

programme.title: Adventures in Robot-Sitting
programme.desc: The Never Witch's sudden assault forces the dream chasers to split up. While the main team rushes to the mysterious Dunes of Duralumina, Nova and Sneak are left behind to defend.

programme.title: Personal Space Invaders
programme.desc: With the Never Witch on the loose, the dream chasers head to Oz and Albert's landing to use Oz's enchanted telescope. But what should have been?

programme.desc: Aliya and Liann take matters into their own hands as they go undercover to solve the mystery of Ley-La, the secretive and enigmatic figure who's been lurking around the periphery of their lives. Posing as reporters, they dig deep and discover a key clue.

programme.title: The Royal Blacksmiths
programme.desc: The four ninja go undercover as a dance troupe and enter a talent contest in their quest to win “The Blade Cup” where one of the fang blades is hidden.

programme.title: Marvel Superheroes
programme.desc: Avengers: Loki In Training Loki arrives at Avengers Tower declaring he wants to be an Avenger. Our heroes are skeptical, but Iron Man decides to make Loki an ”Avenger In Training”. It's a great plan until Thanos arrives on Earth looking for Loki

programme.title: The Book Of Total Badness
programme.desc: The NEXO-Knights must fight Jestro's Monsters of Destruction which are attacking all over the Kingdom. But Merlok smells a trap…is he right? In a dark, destroyed part of the kingdom, Jestro arrives at the ruins of a HUGE castle. The Book of Monsters knows this place: the great evil wizard Monstrux lived here. The Book sniffs out some powerful magic in the ruins: “The Book of Destruction.” With this, The Book tells Jestro they can destroy the NEXO-Knights and then attack the King's Castle and cause massive destruction. Jestro creates destructive monsters and sends them all over the realm, so the Knights must separate and fight single combats all over the place. The Knights lose these battles (lesson: they have to work as a team!) And, just when the Knights are scattered across the Kingdom, Jestro attacks the King's Castle! It looks like all is lost. When Aaron, who has escaped, returns to see Jestro's attack, he realizes he must gather his fellow Knights. Merlok says it's very dangerous

programme.title: Gorilla's Gone Wild
programme.desc: Cragger angers the Gorilla tribe and they march to the Crocodile Swamp to teach him a lesson. But the Gorilla Mechs are not fit for the swampy water and the Lions and Eagles must come to the rescue. The only problem is that the Lions don't like water ... at all!

programme.title: The Haunted and the Hunted!
programme.desc: Something mysterious lurking the jungle wrecks a construction site, and Hudson is convinced a ghost is responsible - but it might be something even more surprising.

programme.title: The Snowball Effect
programme.desc: Laval and Li'Ella's relationship grows as he gives her a tour of the Lion City. But distracted, he misses a key battle against the Hunters. Tormak joins the fight and saves the day. But the Lion King Lagravis is captured and brought to the Ice Fort. Who will lead the Lions now?!?

programme.title: Chaos Unchained
programme.desc: The Ninja hurry to the First Land to stop the Forbidden Five from freeing ThunderFang, and Wyldfyre discovers a drastic cure to Roby's decay.

programme.title: The Shatter Dragon
programme.desc: ThunderFang is freed, and only the Ninja stand between the Shatter Dragon of Chaos and his revenge.

programme.title: Prophecy Of The Green Ninja, Greatest Battles
programme.desc: So the final puzzle forces ninja to question the true meaning of the Green Ninja Prophecy. Solving the puzzles releases a new peril for the Ninja to face. Will memories of their greatest victories be enough to defeat it?

programme.title: The Power and the Peril!
programme.desc: Rock star mathematician Ian Malcolm returns to Isla Nublar and helps Claire, Owen and Hudson deal with strange power surges all over Jurassic World.

programme.title: Fistful of Doppelgangers
programme.desc: The Candy Realm is under siege, and the dream chasers are tasked with saving its sugary inhabitants. As they orchestrate a mass evacuation, Mateo and Astrid sneak into the Midnight Raven.

programme.title: Irrational Treasure
programme.desc: The elusive Eye of Confusion has been located, but the dream chasers are not alone in their pursuit. With the Never Witch's doppelgangers on their heels, the team embarks on a frantic treasure hunt.

programme.title: Mission Inplausible
programme.desc: As the Eye of Confusion's power threatens to unravel reality, Logan and Astrid are forced to confront their deepest fears in the Dream Forge.

programme.desc: Nova pulls off a series of pranks, leaving her friends scrambling and laughing. However, things take a dark turn when one of her pranks goes awry and sends the group into a terrifying situation.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Bob and the gang have got a big job on - repairing some pipework in Farmer Pickles field. / Bob, Scoop & Muck have to make repairs to a tunnel. When they arrive on site, Bob sends Muck ahead into the tunnel with a load of bricks.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: During a mission to one of Robotnik's factories, Sally is taken prisoner by Robotnik and Snively, who construct a roboti-sized "Sally" clone, complete with Sally's personality, and mannerisms. The double tricks Sonic into rescuing "Sally".

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic attempts a solo rescue to prevent prisoners from being roboti-sized and is hit by a Memory Scrambler that erases short-term memory.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Tails brings a new friend home to Knothole - a baby Terra-Pod who has strayed from the herd that is currently migrating. Sonic, Sally, and some of the other Freedom Fighters return the Baby-T to its mom and the rest of the herd.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: After Dulcy exhibits strange behavior, Sally discovers she's going through a "rites of passage" stage of her adolescence. In Dragon tradition, she is drawn to Dragon Lair, a migratory nesting ground, through trance-like visits from her mother.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sonic becomes aggravated that maybe their efforts of fighting for freedom seem pointless. Sonia suggests that they go to the Oracle for advice.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: The Hedgehogs congregate on the Floating Island in their latest effort to find their mother. But Sleet and Dingo also have an interest in this island.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: On a trip to Port Mobius, Sonic, Manic and Sonia are told that ships are sinking due to the Mobian sea-beast.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: While lost in the wastelands of Mobius, Sonic, Manic and Sonia stumble upon an oasis called Lake Valley Resort.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sleet and Dingo plan to collect the taxes owed to Robotnik from the Duke of Velcronia but keep it for themselves.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Robotnik has his eyes set upon Queen Aleena's crown jewel, but Sonic, Manic and Sonia plan to retrieve the gem before Robotnik.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: The Hedgehogs steal historical artifacts of Mobuis from Robotnik before he can pawn them off at an auction.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sonia discovers that the watch she received from her friend is actually a monitoring device for the Robotnik Intelligence Agency.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Robotnik announces that he will marry Queen Aleena in a plot to become the king of Mobius.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: A fast talking, travelling salesman named Wes Weasley sells Robotnik various hedgehog-catching gadgets, including the Darkenator, the Super-duper Gravity Stopper, and the De-Atomizer.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Sonic rescues Lucas, a rival of Robotnik's, from Robotnik's dungeons. But Robotnik will do anything to keep Lucas from finding his lost love, Lucinda, including proposing to her himself.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Big Griz, leader of a group of biker-bear rebels, mistakes Scratch and Grounder for Sonic and Tails, and teams up with S and G to attack the real Sonic and Tails.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Tails gets a megadose of Robotniks growth gas and grows quickly to monstrous proportions, eating everything in sight and accidentally terrorizing the countryside.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Tails' New Home When Sonic decides to find Tails a suitable foster home, Robotnik finds out, and creates a robot fox family which poses as Tails' long lost parents. Sonic leaves Tails with the fox family, but finally realizes they're robots and rescues Tails.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Blank-Headed Eagle After an accident, Scratch thinks he's an eagle and on the side of Sonic. In order to impress his his new lady love, Scratch assists Sonic in an excursion into Robotnik's Fortress to turn off a dangerous force field.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Mystery of the Missing Hi-Tops Sonic turns detective to solve the mystery of his missing Red Sneakers--and just in time to get them back and stop Dr. Robotnik's latest attack on a peaceful Mobius village.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Tails adopts a cute and fuzzy pet named Walter who turns out to be a black hole who sucks up everything in Mobius. Realizing that Walter is from another dimension our heroes have to return him.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic conquers Robotnik's latest evil - a vehicle designated to locate and destroy living tissue matter - during a solo mission to the Badlands. Upon Sonic's return, the Freedom Fighters honor him with a victory party.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When Robotnik launches a spy-orb that will uncover the Freedom Fighter's Knothole location, Sonic and Robot launch themselves up to the orbiting spy-sphere aboard a home-made rocket powered by Robotnik's discarded booster engine.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When a blizzard hits Knothole causing Dulcy to demolish a few huts during a landing, Sonic is forced to bunk with Antoine. // During a rainstorm, Rotor is putting the finishing touches on his new female robot assistant, named Ro-Becca.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic reluctantly takes Tails with him to the Big City to find some cotter pins for the Freedom Fighters catapults. While in the City, Sonic is nearly eaten alive by his old dog Muttski, now a roboti-sized guard dog in the Junk Heaps

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic and The Freedom Fighters journey to Robotnik's underground air base in a mission to reprogram the launch data on Robotnik's fleet of Stealth-Bot aircraft. While attempting to reprogram the Stealth-Bot computer system.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: After a disastrous failed mission, Sonic laments that they can't go back and prevent Robotnik's take-over. Dulcy tells them they can and takes Sonic and Sally to the Floating Island where they find the "Time Stones".

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic and the Freedom Fighters journey to Robotnik's lab in hopes of deciphering his roboti-sizer system. While underground, Sonic spots his now roboti-sized Uncle Chuck aboard a Badlands bound mine-train and devises a plan for his rescue.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: On a mission to contact the first Freedom Fighters on the King's List, Sonic and the others are forced to travel through a tunnel which carries a "curse" against all intruders.

programme.desc: Jeremy Wade investigates reports of a creature terrorizing the Florida Keys.

programme.title: Bone Crusher
programme.desc: In the remote Amazon, Jeremy Wade seeks a predator which cannot be caught with a rod.

programme.title: River Of Blood
programme.desc: In Argentina, Jeremy Wade hunts for a vicious predator known as the 'River Tiger'.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killer
programme.desc: Travelling from London to Greenland and on to Norway.

programme.title: Asian Slayer
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade travels to the Himalayas to investigate river attacks.

programme.title: Congo Killer

programme.title: Face Ripper
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade investigates the story of a man who had his face ripped off in Bolivia.

programme.title: Hidden Predator

programme.title: Malaysian Lake Monster
