programme.title: Alaskan Horror
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade goes into the forbidding Alaskan wilderness to visit two large lakes.

programme.title: Secrets of the Sea
programme.desc: Jeremy goes behind the scenes and we see what went into the making of a season at sea.

programme.title: Pack of Teeth
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade is in southern Africa on the banks of the Okavango.

programme.title: Jungle Killer
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade heads to the jungles of South America to track down a dangerous fish.

programme.title: Mekong Mutilator
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade heads to south east Asia's Mekong river in search of a baby-faced killer.

programme.title: Volcanic Island Terror
programme.desc: On a volcanic Pacific island, an ancient fishing community is being terrorised.

programme.title: Russian Killer
programme.desc: The disappearance of three men in Russia proves to be a baffling case for Jeremy Wade.

programme.title: Atomic Assassin
programme.desc: Angler Jeremy Wade braves the radiation in Chernobyl on the trail of a monster fish.

programme.title: Piranha
programme.desc: Are the stories of piranha attacks on humans just myth and imagination?

programme.title: Rift Valley Killer
programme.desc: Extreme angler Jeremy Wade is on a quest to Africa's Great Rift Valley.

programme.title: Amazon Titanic
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade investigates the sinking on the Amazon of the Sobral Santos.

programme.title: Africa's Deadliest
programme.desc: Wildlife series. Jeremy Wade investigates the ferocious and carnivorous tigerfish.

programme.title: Canadian Horror
programme.desc: The hunt for a 20-foot lake monster that attacks humans in Canada's wilderness.

programme.title: Meet Me in New York
programme.desc: Kelly is a young, creative, ambitious events planner in New York City and quickly gaining a reputation as one of the best in the business. But when Joe, an influential website editor, hires her to organize his niece's 10th birthday party, Kelly quickly realizes that she may have just met her match.

programme.title: Diana
programme.desc: Celebrated and adored by millions, she was the Queen of people's hearts, yet the bittersweet story of the last man to truly capture hers has never before. In a story that until now has remained untold, Diana introduces a time in the Princess's life that was important in shaping her final years...

programme.title: Just My Luck
programme.desc: Sexy Manhattanite Ashley is known as the luckiest woman around, but after a chance romantic encounter with down-and-out Jake, she realizes that she's swapped her fortune for his.

programme.title: Life or Something Like It
programme.desc: The perfect world of a beautiful Seattle television reporter is shattered by the prediction of her death in seven days.

programme.title: 10 Years
programme.desc: 10 Years follows a group of friends on the night of their high school reunion who, a decade after leaving school, still haven't quite grown up.

programme.title: The Wedding Arrangements
programme.desc: When talented botanist Violet needs help preparing flower arrangements for a high-profile wedding, she calls upon Jack, a handsome nature photographer who has taken over responsibility for his grandfather's flower shed.

programme.title: Still Today
programme.desc: After being left at the altar, Pete's groomsman give him a wedding gift he'll never forget. An escort. Maybe it's the Lunar Eclipse, maybe it's fate, but after a magical night in the city maybe this girl is what Pete needed all along.

programme.title: Elvis And Anabelle
programme.desc: After a miracle, a beauty queen and a small town boy are thrown together in this life affirming story of young love.

programme.title: As I Am
programme.desc: One week of school remains for Kai, an aspiring writer, and his friends. How they spend this time will cost one of them their life and leave them changed forever.

programme.title: Can You Keep A Secret?
programme.desc: On a return flight from a botched client meeting, Emma reveals all of her deepest secrets to a handsome stranger when her plane hits turbulence and she believes she is going to die. Emma thinks she will never see the guy again.

programme.title: Programming will resume shortly
programme.desc: We're catching up on our beauty sleep! Stay tuned for more priceless entertainment curated by Rakuten TV.

programme.title: The Beauty Of Love
programme.desc: Emma has a lifestyle website that she puts her heart and soul into called “Classically Emma”. But when her numbers start trending down, she thinks she might've found her fix in a partnership with an ambitious millennial named Jill who has her own dreams.

programme.title: The Decoy Bride
programme.desc: When the wedding of super star Lara Tyler (Alice Eve - Bombshell) to tweedy English author James Arber (David Tennant – Doctor Who) is sabotaged by paparazzi, they decide to relocate the event to the one place where the world's press won't find them.

programme.title: Big Momma's House 2
programme.desc: Undercover Agent Malcolm Turner is back and this time he's out to expose the suspected designer of a deadly computer "worm" that would allow outside forces access to sophistical and critical government intelligence files.

programme.title: Gray Matters
programme.desc: They finish each other's sentences, dance like Fred and Ginger, and share the same downtown loft – the perfect couple? Not exactly. Gray and Sam, are a sister and brother so compatible and inseparable that people actually assume they are dating.

programme.title: The King Of Comedy
programme.desc: A struggling comedian gambles his uncertain future on a crazy scheme to ransom his way onto television by kidnapping a popular talk show host.

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Grace (Selena Gomez) is an ordinary girl who becomes an accidental princess when a family summer trip to Paris turns into the fantasy of a lifetime. Living like royalty, Grace, along with her two best friends, discovers who she really is – by assuming another person's identity.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Calvin (Ice Cube) is a would-be entrepreneur with big plans...and running his family's barbershop isn't one of them. But when he impulsively sells the shop to a shady loan shark, he soon realizes just how important the neighborhood parlor is to him... and just how far he'll go to get it back!

programme.title: Killing Gunther
programme.desc: A dysfunctional team of young assassins set out to make a name for themselves by killing the most notorious hitman of all time, Gunther (Arnold Schwarzenegger).

programme.title: Elvis & Nixon
programme.desc: Get ready for the astonishing true story of when Elvis Presley met President Nixon. At 6.30am on December 21st 1970, the King of Rock'n Roll showed up on the lawn of the White House to request a meeting with the most powerful man in the world, President Richard Nixon.

programme.title: Sword of Trust
programme.desc: An acclaimed comedy from revered director Lynn Shelton (Say When, Your Sister's Sister), starring Marc Maron (Glow), Jillian Bell (Brittany Runs a Marathon), Jonathan Bass (Baywatch) and Michaela Watkins (Transparent).

programme.title: I Want You Back
programme.desc: Peter and Emma thought they were on the precipice of life's biggest moments – marriage, kids, and houses in the suburbs – until their respective partners dumped them.

programme.title: Electric Jesus
programme.desc: When a promoter sells a Christian metal band on the promise of a summer tour in 1986, their desire to "make Jesus famous" meets the complexities and confusion of personal ambition, youthful zeal, lifelong friendships, and first love.

programme.title: A Storybook Christmas
programme.desc: (2019) Christmas romance with Ali Liebert. When event planner Celeste calls in help to give her niece the perfect Christmas, will the nanny agency's unexpected choice be perfect for her too?

programme.title: Christmas On The River
programme.desc: When a woman returns home to celebrate the anniversary of the town's Sugarcane Festival, she rediscovers the magic of Christmas. Starring Jana Kramer (2019)

programme.title: A Gift For Christmas
programme.desc: Aiden is swept off his feet when Darcy knocks him over on her bicycle. Suffering from amnesia, they attempt to rediscover who Aiden really is. But will their adventure ultimately lead to love? (2017)

programme.title: Jingle Around the Clock
programme.desc: (2018) Holly-jolly rom-com starring Brooke Nevin. An ad exec's Christmas dreams take a turn when she's forced to team up with her rival on a career-altering project.

programme.title: A Christmas To Cherish
programme.desc: (2019) Heartwarming holiday drama with Peter Porte. A couple preparing to celebrate the perfect Christmas together must swap the fireside eggnog for a fight to save the beloved local community centre.

programme.title: A Christmas Reunion
programme.desc: (2015) Romance starring Denise Richards and Patrick Muldoon. A high-flying executive inherits half of her aunt's bakery, but when she meets the co-owner, will it be a recipe for disaster or romance?

programme.title: The Nine Lives Of Christmas
programme.desc: (2014) Festive romance with Brandon Routh and Kimberley Sustad. A committed bachelor and a busy vet student have no time for love. But will the arrival of a stray tabby lead to the purr-fect romance?

programme.title: Her Magical Christmas
programme.desc: (2017) Seasonal drama with Jessica Lowndes. Heartbroken at Christmas, a woman loses her sparkle until magical ornaments sent by her mother help bring her hope, courage and maybe a touch of new love.

programme.title: Christmas in the Air
programme.desc: Robert, a widower and father of two children, enlists Lydia to help him juggle his chaotic work-life balance at Christmastime. Will their close relationship lead to love? Stars Catherine Bell. (2017)

programme.title: Santa's Secret
programme.desc: (2014) Christmas romance starring Alicia Witt. A single mum rediscovers the magic of the season when unexpected love - and a surprising new job opportunity - come her way. Also starring Wallace Shawn.

programme.title: A Christmas Recipe For Romance
programme.desc: Abby asks a renowned chef to teach her to cook ahead of a Christmas cookery competition that could save her family's historic inn. Could love be on the menu? Starring Madeline Leon. (2019)

programme.title: My Sweet Holiday
programme.desc: (2020) Festive romance starring Malone Thomas. When Sadie agrees to train the charming new owner of her family's chocolate shop, she gets more than a taste of holiday love.

programme.title: Proud Valley
programme.desc: David Goliath, an unemployed stoker from a Cardiff tramp steamer, is making his way up the Welsh valleys in search of work.

programme.title: Find the Lady
programme.desc: When a pretty model spends New Year's Eve investigating the disappearance of her grandmother she is drawn into a sinister web of theft, kidnapping and, finally, murder.

programme.title: Circus of Fear
programme.desc: Following an audacious theft of banknotes, Inspector Elliott of Scotland Yard poses as a photographer to visit the circus from which some of the banknotes have come into circulation.

programme.title: Beast Must Die
programme.desc: Millionaire big game hunter Tom Newcliffe assembles an odd assortment of guests at his hunting lodge with the purpose of tracking down the biggest game of all - a werewolf.

programme.title: Penny and the Pownall Case
programme.desc: An artist's model, with aspirations to be an amateur detective, helps a Scotland Yard detective break a gang helping Nazi war criminals escape from Europe.

programme.title: Take My Life
programme.desc: When a temperamental opera star finds out her husband is accused of murder she sets off to find the real killer and is determined to prove her husbands innocence. As she comes closer to the truth, she also comes closer to danger.

programme.title: Behind The Headlines
programme.desc: When a journalist begins his investigations into the murder of a woman, he is joined by a pretty female reporter who is more intent on catching him than the murderer.

programme.title: Black Orchid
programme.desc: When John falls in love with his wife's sister he asks his wife for a divorce. Their plans are ruined when it is revealed that it is illegal for him to marry his divorced wife's sister. When she suddenly dies it looks suspiciously like murder.

programme.title: The Embezzler
programme.desc: When an elderly bank clerk with only two years to live absconds with the contents of a bank safe, his plan to escape to a hot and exciting South American country to live out his final years in a blaze of fun and wealth becomes ever more precarious.

programme.title: The Hideout
programme.desc: Helen has to deliver a case. When the case is mistaken as part of Steve's luggage he gives it to his friend, Tim, to return. Tim opens the case to find it is full of money, which leads him to Helen's father and a whole lot of trouble.

programme.title: Passport to Shame
programme.desc: When the innocent-faced Malou, having been framed with a crime in Paris, arrives at a sordid brothel in England, it seems that she is condemned to a miserable and soul-destroying life...

programme.title: Blackmail
programme.desc: Alice White, the sweetheart of London detective Frank Webber, murders in self-defense an artist who brutally attempts to seduce her in his studio.

programme.title: Death Line

programme.title: Circus of Horrors
programme.desc: Dr. Rossiter, a plastic surgeon wanted by the police, flees to France and under an assumed name acquires, by murder, a run-down circus.

programme.title: Night of the Eagle

programme.desc: The Shepherds head on a family trip to Bournemouth to see how Chatty is getting on in rehab, while Billie and Greg finally head off on a romantic break to celebrate their anniversary after a dramatic few months.

programme.title: The Only Way Is Essex
programme.desc: Gatsby finds out about Courtney's allegation that he was texting girls behind Dani's back. Diags is determined to give his world record attempt another try, and Joey reveals his plans for pastures new. Pete and Lockie make plans to move in together, and Frankie's new beau Tommy C meets the inner circle.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire
programme.desc: The friendship retreat is in full swing as safaris, cooking and island hopping see the Housewives bonding - however, things don't stay harmonious for long as the Thailand adventure continues. Paige is feeling homesick and struggling to find a connection with the other mothers, Ell is still reeling after previous confrontations, and Seema's friendship with Nicole and Paige falls into question when things take an unexpected turn.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Potomac [NEW]
programme.desc: Stacey gets some heat for her relationship with TJ; Wendy makes a grand invitation to continue her 40th festivities in Panama. Karen hosts a Love Lagoon party at her home.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey
programme.desc: Dolores dives deeper into her relationship with Paul; Danielle and Rachel's feud hits a new tipping point; Teresa makes shocking new allegations against Melissa, which places even more strain on the relationship between Gorgas and the Giudices.

programme.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
programme.desc: Lady Leshurr, Gabby Logan and Adam Thomas all try to "say what they see" as they guess well-known phrases for the chance to win a 50,000-pound jackpot for their chosen charity.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Join Stephen Mulhern as Nikki gets her chance to open the iconic red boxes. She may take a tempting offer from the Banker or hold out and try to beat the Banker with what was inside her randomly-selected box all along.

programme.title: The 1% Club
programme.desc: Lee Mack presents the game show where the questions aren't about general knowledge but logic, brainpower and common sense. 100 contestants begin each edition, who'll face the final question, which only 1 per cent of the population can get right.

programme.title: Big Brother [NEW]
programme.desc: A new cast of carefully selected housemates from all walks of life will take up residence in the world's most famous reality TV home for up to six weeks, with cameras capturing their every move and the nation following every twist and turn.

programme.title: Big Brother: Late and Live [NEW]
programme.desc: Filmed at the Big Brother house in front of a live studio audience, the go-to destination for the first live interviews with evictees, exclusive camera run access, celebrity guest commentary, debates, and weekly nomination results.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter prepares for a fight with Liam Neeson, while Lois becomes a class mum and pays more attention to the other children over Stewie.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Cleveland becomes an unlicensed therapist and gives Lois marriage advice that Peter does not like, and Quagmire gets Meg a job working in airport security.

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: When one of Roger's characters falls in love with Dick, it affects the whole family.

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Steve's efforts to befriend a Swedish exchange student backfire in a big way. The family calls in an animal behaviourist to deal with Klaus.

programme.title: Plebs
programme.desc: The boys face uncertainty when the Landlord evicts them without notice. Marcus hopes his parents, who are visiting, will help him onto the property ladder, but his dad has other plans. Plus, Jason's smooth-talking lands him a job as an estate agent.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts as David tries to open the 22 red boxes in the right order, taking on the infamous Banker for the chance to win a life-changing cash prize.

programme.title: Unwind with ITV
programme.desc: A daily delivery of bespoke Mindfulness content designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Unwind with ITV
programme.desc: A daily delivery of bespoke Mindfulness content designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

programme.title: A Quiet Passion
programme.desc: Emily Dickinson, 1830 in Amherst, Massachusetts geboren, erfasste mit ihren gefühlvollen Gedichten auf unnachahmliche Art und Weise sowohl den Schrecken, als auch die Schönheit der Welt. Dabei hat sie davon selbst nicht viel gesehen. Nachdem ihr Vater (Keith Carradine) die gegen die evangelistischen Lehren rebellierende Emily (Emma Bell, Cynthia Nixon) schon früh aus der Schule nahm, verbrachte sie fortan die Zeit zusammen mit ihrem Bruder Austin und ihrer Schwester Vinnie in ihrem Elternhaus, das sie selten verließ. Sie hatte nur wenige Kontakte außerhalb der Familie und verbrachte Nacht um Nacht mit dem Verfassen von Gedichten. - 'A Quiet Passion' beleuchtet das Leben und die Werke der herausragenden Poetin, die mit einem außerordentlichen Intellekt, aber einer labilen Psyche ausgestattet war, in ihrer großen Schaffensphase.

programme.title: Der Liebhaber
programme.desc: 5 Jahre nach dem Tod ihres Sohnes will Tess leben, doch die Besessenheit eines Soldaten stürzt sie ins Chaos.

programme.title: Liebe kochen

programme.title: Essen, trinken und heiraten
programme.desc: Billie und Charlie legen ihre Differenzen beiseite, um sicherzustellen, dass Max und Jess heiraten und sich ineinander verlieben.

programme.title: Alex & Eve
programme.desc: Alex ist ein smarter griechisch-orthodoxer Lehrer und notorischer Junggeselle. Dann verliebt er sich in Eve, eine attraktive, erfolgreiche Anwältin und - Muslimin…

programme.title: Eine Hochzeit wie im Bilderbuch

programme.title: So finden Sie die Ewigkeit

programme.title: Eine zweite Chance für die erste Liebe
programme.desc: Kathy Yoder (Galadriel Stineman) hat ihr Leben in einer amischen Gemeinde hinter sich gelassen und reist als erfolgreiche Reiseführerautorin durch die Welt. Der Tod ihres Vaters führt sie zurück in ihr Heimatdorf – und damit in ihre Vergangenheit, die sie längst hinter sich geglaubt hat. Die früheren Freunde stehen ihr, 'der modernen Geschäftsfrau', die sich von der amischen Lebensweise abgewandt hat, allerdings sehr skeptisch gegenüber. Besonders ihre Schwester Miriam (Madison Lawlor) kann ihr nicht verzeihen, dass sie die Familie damals im Stich gelassen hat. Doch die alte Umgebung und die vertrauten Bräuche geben ihr ein lange nicht gekanntes Gefühl von Geborgenheit...

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Athena gets Gnasher envy when seeing a pampered version of Gnasher in a magazine and when she hears that Dennis owns an Abyssinian wire-haired tripe hound (Gnasher), she wants him. However, being an owner to Gnasher isn't all cracked up to be! Followed by 'Splash'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis gets a case of the hiccups from Mr. Har Har's can-o-giggles and is looking for a way to cure them ready for a film premier. Followed by Athena's Party

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: The garden is accidentaly wrecked when Dennis tries to give Gnasher a bath, so the gang have to fix the mess before Mum comes home. Followed by 'Run Rabbit Run'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis makes a line of practical jokes for Mr. Scrimp, called 'The Menace Collection.' However, Dennis soon learns that it will put Mr. Har Har out of business.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After Walter takes up origami as a martial art, Dennis scoffs and comes up with his own martial art, and so the two prepare to battle it out. Followed by 'Smelling of Roses'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After watching a film about an alien invasion, Dennis, Curly and Pie Face decide to make their own film. However, Walter stumbles across them filming, and he only sees the action, not the camera. Filming what he sees on his mobile phone, he runs to tell the whole of Beanotown about the alien invasion. As panic spreads, Dennis and his friends discover the chaos and decide to keep filming in order to help make the best of their own alien film. Meanwhile, Sergeant Slipper investigates the alien landing that Walter has seen, and discovers the truth—that the spaceship is a playhouse with glow sticks in it. Followed by 'Castle in the Air'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis and his pet dog, Gnasher, live by just one rule: Kids should make all the rules! Followed by Dance of the Seven Pies.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: To get his friends back from Walter's group, Dennis challenges Walter to a videogames battle. Followed by 'Fish Tale'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: For a school project, Dennis and Walter both build robots. However, during an accident, both robots merge, causing Dennis and Walter to defend the school. Followed by 'No Joke.'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: With one backstage pass for a Ratbucket gig, Dennis and his friends pass themselves off as Ratbucket, only for the real Ratbucket not to be able to play at his own concert. Followed by 60 second Dennis and 'Bad Dad'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After Dennis breaks his bike, Dad is unable to afford a new one, so Dennis convinces him to ask his boss for a raise. Unfortunately, Mr Scrimp reduces his wages instead. Dennis then trashes his house to convince Scrimp that his family are poor, so that Mr Scrimp will feel compelled to raise Dad's wages. Just as Scrimp has been taken in by Dennis' plan, Mum and Dad arrive home laden with shopping bags, resulting in Dad getting fired on the spot. Dennis resolves to get Dad his old job back by secretly causing chaos at his office. To restore order Scrimp rehires Dad, sealing the deal with a generous pay rise. Mum and Dad repair the house, but still don't have enough money to buy Dennis a new bike, instead it gets repaired with Dad's office rubber bands and paperclips. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Dennis Hiccups'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Believing Gnasher and Gnipper to be trapped in Beanotown Dog Pound, Dennis comes up with a plan to rescue his friends and bring them both home. Followed by more Dennis and Gnasher episodes.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: When Dennis breaks his skateboard again, Dad agrees to buy Dennis the best skateboard there is as a replacement if he is able to win a prize at the upcoming school award ceremony. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Dance of the Seven Pies'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis tries to get a birthday present by saying thank you to his relatives. However, because of Dennis' naughty personality, they take his attempts in a negative way. Followed by 'Dennis Hiccups'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: To get his friends back from Walter's group, Dennis challenges Walter to a videogames battle. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Masters of the House'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After a wrestling accident, Gnasher swallows a canister of laughing gas at the vet's. Dennis, along with Gnasher hide in the conference centre, where dad gives a speech. However, the canister leaks, causing Gnasher to fart laughing gas and having everyone laughing. Followed by 'Attack of the Walterbot'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis and Co. have to control Pie Face's obsession with pies during the Pie Festival. Otherwise, they will be grounded. Followed by 'Great Outdoors'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: On a school trip, Dennis finds out that he is descentant to a warrior tribe. He also discovers that Montanna Smith (a famous Indiana Jones-esque explorer and one of Walter's personal heroes) is actually a thief who's trying to steal the treasure of Dennis' ancestor. Will he be stopped before he gets his hands on the treasure? Followed by Dog Tired.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Mum has bought curtain material for the soon to be newly decorated kitchen, and asks Dad to look after it while she is out. However, Dad falls asleep and mistakenly agrees that Dennis can use it as a giant sail. When Dad realises that it has gone, he calls Dennis to bring it back, but unfortunately Dennis gets into a spot of bother with the colonel, who takes the curtain material off Dennis. In an attempt to steal it back, the garden being wrecked and the kitchen is left looking like a bombsite. Dennis, Gnasher and Dad have to clean up the whole kitchen and redecorate it in time for Mum returning. When Mum decides it is time to hang the new curtains, Dennis is about to get the curtain material, but Mum reveals that she has changed her mind and bought new curtains instead. Followed by 'Fangs for the Memories'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis, his friends and Walter's friends get marooned on a desert island when Dennis attempts to escape a boring field trip. Followed by Substitute Creecher

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis plays a prank on the citizens of Beanotown, causing them to evacuate, which causes trouble for Dennis later. Followed by 'No Place Like Home'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Gnasher and Gnipper enter a dog show, regardless of Walter saying they don't have true talent. He wants Athena and Miss Mini Wuff to win, but Walter has just underestimated Gnasher's true capabilities. Followed by Grounded.

Dennis, Gnasher and Dad have to clean up the whole kitchen and redecorate it in time for Mum returning. When Mum decides it is time to hang the new curtains, Dennis is about to get the curtain material, but Mum reveals that she has changed her mind and bought new curtains instead. Followed by 'Fangs for the Memories'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis, his friends and Walter's friends get marooned on a desert island when Dennis attempts to escape a boring field trip. Followed by Substitute Creecher

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis plays a prank on the citizens of Beanotown, causing them to evacuate, which causes trouble for Dennis later. Followed by 'No Place Like Home'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Gnasher and Gnipper enter a dog show, regardless of Walter saying they don't have true talent. He wants Athena and Miss Mini Wuff to win, but Walter has just underestimated Gnasher's true capabilities. Followed by Grounded.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Athena gets Gnasher envy when seeing a pampered version of Gnasher in a magazine and when she hears that Dennis owns an Abyssinian wire-haired tripe hound (Gnasher), she wants him. However, being an owner to Gnasher isn't all cracked up to be! Followed by 'Splash'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis gets a case of the hiccups from Mr. Har Har's can-o-giggles and is looking for a way to cure them ready for a film premier. Followed by Athena's Party

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: The garden is accidentaly wrecked when Dennis tries to give Gnasher a bath, so the gang have to fix the mess before Mum comes home. Followed by 'Run Rabbit Run'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis makes a line of practical jokes for Mr. Scrimp, called 'The Menace Collection.' However, Dennis soon learns that it will put Mr. Har Har out of business.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After Walter takes up origami as a martial art, Dennis scoffs and comes up with his own martial art, and so the two prepare to battle it out. Followed by 'Smelling of Roses'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After watching a film about an alien invasion, Dennis, Curly and Pie Face decide to make their own film. However, Walter stumbles across them filming, and he only sees the action, not the camera. Filming what he sees on his mobile phone, he runs to tell the whole of Beanotown about the alien invasion. As panic spreads, Dennis and his friends discover the chaos and decide to keep filming in order to help make the best of their own alien film. Meanwhile, Sergeant Slipper investigates the alien landing that Walter has seen, and discovers the truth—that the spaceship is a playhouse with glow sticks in it. Followed by 'Castle in the Air'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis and his pet dog, Gnasher, live by just one rule: Kids should make all the rules! Followed by Dance of the Seven Pies.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: To get his friends back from Walter's group, Dennis challenges Walter to a videogames battle. Followed by 'Fish Tale'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: For a school project, Dennis and Walter both build robots. However, during an accident, both robots merge, causing Dennis and Walter to defend the school. Followed by 'No Joke.'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: With one backstage pass for a Ratbucket gig, Dennis and his friends pass themselves off as Ratbucket, only for the real Ratbucket not to be able to play at his own concert. Followed by 60 second Dennis and 'Bad Dad'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After Dennis breaks his bike, Dad is unable to afford a new one, so Dennis convinces him to ask his boss for a raise. Unfortunately, Mr Scrimp reduces his wages instead. Dennis then trashes his house to convince Scrimp that his family are poor, so that Mr Scrimp will feel compelled to raise Dad's wages. Just as Scrimp has been taken in by Dennis' plan, Mum and Dad arrive home laden with shopping bags, resulting in Dad getting fired on the spot. Dennis resolves to get Dad his old job back by secretly causing chaos at his office. To restore order Scrimp rehires Dad, sealing the deal with a generous pay rise. Mum and Dad repair the house, but still don't have enough money to buy Dennis a new bike, instead it gets repaired with Dad's office rubber bands and paperclips. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Dennis Hiccups'.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Unsound Smurf: In an effort to give Papa some quiet time, Brainy uses one of Papa's spells to create a magical sound barrier around the village. Papa cannot reverse the spell and sends the Smurflings, who are trapped outside the Village, to a noisemaker. Baby takes a bottle of sound from the noisemaker, which breaks the barrier.

programme.title: Smurf Box Derby
programme.desc: Handy Smurf makes another invention: the Smurfmobile. Each Smurf has his – or her – customized vehicle and all, or almost all, the Smurfs enjoy a little spin... But then the evil wizard Gargamel gets hold of the idea and starts making trouble for the Smurfs...

programme.title: The Bad Place
programme.desc: What is this little moon coming from above? Why, it's a crater-pockmarked globe of mud inhabited by the Grimeys, a family of mud-splattering, mud-eating creatures from out there in the sky. Not all the Smurfs are enthusiastic about the visitors....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Bigmouth's Friend: Gargamel and Balthazar command a giant robot to force King Gerard to hand over Clockwork Smurf. When the robot is about to destroy the castle, Clockwork's new, large, and awkward friend Bigmouth defeats the robot. Clockwork is hurt in the battle but Handy fixes him and implants a voice box so he can say "Hi"!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Crooner Smurf: Harmony Smurf is no longer wanted in the Smurf Choir: his singing is too far off-key. But Papa Smurf gives him an amulet that will make him a vocal virtuoso. Now here comes Hogatha...

programme.title: He Who Smurfs Last
programme.desc: Jokey's practical jokes go too far when Chlorhydris is the victim of one. She gets her revenge on the Smurfs by creating a spell to steal their sense of humor. Grouchy, who had no sense of humor to begin with, breaks the spell by getting back the humor potion.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sassette: Snappy and Nat steal Gargamel's formula to make another Smurf – a female to be a companion to Smurfette. They create Sassette, who causes mischief wherever she goes. Papa uses his Smurfiness Solution to turn Gargamel's evil Sassette into a playful Smurfy Sassette.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Every Picture Smurfs A Story: The evil Maestro's magical paints have the power to transport his models onto canvas – forever! Papa Smurf directs Painter to switch his paints and before long, Maestro is enshrined in a picture next to his dream girl, Smurfette.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Master Smurf: There is an evil power in the Titan's crown that Miner Smurf finds underground. And Greedy Smurf is the Smurf to fall victim to it. Then Gargamel comes up with some new schemes to destroy the Smurfs, and everything gets hopelessly tangled.

programme.title: Have You Smurfed Your Pet Today?
programme.desc: The Smurfs get so involved with Handy's new toy that they forget to feed Puppy. Gargamel lures Puppy into a cage with food and holds him for ransom – the Smurfs' magic secrets. The Smurflings distract Gargamel with the toy long enough to rescue Puppy and they vow to never neglect him again.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Worrywarts: Papa Smurf's worries make him break into a rash of worrywarts. The only way to relieve him of his bout of indecision-inducing disease is to have him rub the horn of a Wartmonger, a sloppy, slimy, stupid and brutal enemy of the Pussywillow Pixies...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Hovel Is Not A Home: In his search for a grander hovel, Gargamel looks in the Great Book of Spells to conjure up a new home. But all of his spells backfire and that convinces him that there's no place like home!

programme.title: Jokey's Joke Book
programme.desc: Jokey Smurf's joke boxes are no longer funny to the other Smurfs. Jokey finds new ideas in his Great Joke Book, but these ideas are even less popular in the Village. And here comes the evil Gargamel with a few jokes of his own...

programme.title: Essence Of Brainy
programme.desc: Brainy Smurf is not the same anymore. He is polite, considerate, modest and calls every other Smurf Sir or Madame. All the Smurfs are worried that Brainy has lost all that makes his personality. They ought to be worried, for Brainy has been the victim of a system called an Essence Remover that Scruple, Gargamel's apprentice, uses... But Brainy's essence is coming back!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Never Smurf Off Till Tomorrow: A fierce wind carries the Smurfs' windmill away, with several Smurfs inside. Is Lazy Smurf really at fault or is an injustice being committed? Are the captive Smurfs going to be saved from the volcano's crater? Is Brainy going to smurf up his mouth for a moment?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurf On Wood: The evil wizard Gargamel once again meets Esmeralda, the gypsy fortune-teller, and she finds a novel way of getting the gold coin that Gargamel imprudently shows her. But the Smurfs in their turn are tricked into believing there is such a thing as a good-luck tree...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Wedding Day: When the flower fairy Nymph arrives at the Smurf Village, all the Smurfs fall for her charm and wit. And soon they learn that she is to be some sort of Mama Smurf to them...

programme.title: The Whole Smurf And Nothing But The Smurf
programme.desc: The evil wizard Gargamel is able to capture the Smurfette. Now he is going to give her a truth serum and know all of Papa Smurf' secrets… But then Gargamel makes a big mistake and gives the Smurfette a fib formula!

programme.title: The Gallant Smurf
programme.desc: Queen Felicity will not let her son, Prince Godfrey, marry his sweetheart Pricilla. What she wants as a daughter-in-law is a girl who shows her something she's never seen before. When Hogatha learns of this, and also discovers the existence of Grandpa Smurf, she feels confident that she can surprise the Queen with her capture. Of course, Hogatha must first capture Grandpa Smurf...

programme.title: Speak For Yourself, Farmer Smurf
programme.desc: Farmer hides his love for Smurfette by assuming a disguise and sending her poems. When they finally meet, they are captured by Bigmouth and in their struggle to get free, they discover their mutual friendship.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Chip Off The Old Smurf: Disaster strikes when Brainy and Baby mix up Papa Smurf's formulas, leaving them powerless before an army of hungry locusts unleashed on the forest by Gargamel.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Comet Is Coming!: Papa's note to the Smurfs about viewing a comet is delivered torn. The Smurfs read only the first part and think their world is coming to an end. They plan how to spend their last day until Papa returns to clear up the misunderstanding and assure them that they are safe.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Lazy's Nightmare: Every time Lazy falls asleep, he is caught in the same recurrent nightmare: he is in the power of Morphio, an evil sorcerer who wants to capture as many sleeping souls as possible. One after another, all the Smurfs are going to fall in Morphio's clutches. All of them? Well, maybe not, if Papa Smurf can help it. And Papa Smurf goes to the Sandman for help...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Loss Of Smurfs: When the emergency call rings, all the Smurfs in the Village drop what they are doing and run to hear the news. But when Vanity Smurf calls for an assembly so that the Smurfs can admire his new hat, it is too much. They send him on his way out of the village, and Vanity has the bad luck of meeting Lofty, the Elf, who suggests a horrible mud bath...

programme.title: The Smurfs And The Money Tree
programme.desc: The wicked wizard Gargamel has come up with yet another diabolical plan with the help of his mother, who isn't much nicer than him. He wants to tempt the Smurfs with money of which they have no notion. Will Greedy take the bait?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Gargamel's Giant: The evil wizard Gargamel wants to create a monster. A horrible, gigantic creature, an awesome being that is going to destroy all the Smurfs! But Gargamel makes a slight mistake, and the result is going to astonish him and his cat Azrael.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Fake Smurf: Hogatha turns herself into a Smurf, plotting revenge on the little people for destroying her magic locket. Papa Smurf outwits her and banishes her from the forest once more.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - All The Smurf's A Stage: Poet Smurf's new play is going to be his greatest work ever, and it will feature the most favourite Smurf of all: Smurfette in the leading female role. All the other Smurfs vie for the honour of playing opposite Smurfette. Even Timid Smurf, who is the shy and retiring type, is a candidate for the part. Brainy Smurf, self-appointed manager of the play, does not see it that way...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurf Who Would Be King: Dreamy yearns to be King after reading a story about them. He falls through a whirlpool while on his ship and finds himself in the land of pokies who think Dreamy is their long-lost King. When he confronts the pokies' enemies, the Norfnags, he finds they aren't fearful at all. Dreamy bumps his head and wakes up to discover it was just a dream, yet finds a jewel in his cap, just like the ones the pokies mine for a living.

programme.title: Master Scruple
programme.desc: Farmer Smurf is the reluctant master of a genie named Gourdy, whose enthusiasm for service is somewhat excessive. After yet another incident due to Gourdy's overzealousness, Farmer Smurf says something he shouldn't and Gourdy disappears. And guess who finds him? Well, it's Scruple, apprentice to the evil wizard Gargamel. And who should steal Gourdy from Scruple, if not Gargamel himself?

programme.title: Alarming Smurfs
programme.desc: Feeling unwanted, the Smurflings run away. They take things to remind them of home, so the Smurfs think there's a thief in their midst. Brainy tries to catch the thief by installing smurfler alarms. The alarms cause a ruckus that draws the Smurflings home, where Papa tells them they are wanted.

programme.title: Smurfiplication
programme.desc: The evil wizard Gargamel creates a magic formula that duplicates everything it touches. And surprise! Suddenly there are six Brainy Smurf! This creates a few interesting situations in the Village... And also at Gargamel's!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sir Hefty: Sir Hefty discovers a wayward knight to help him defeat a dragon whose fire is threatening to destroy the forest. Alas, the knight proves to be a coward, leaving Hefty to prove just how brave he is when he sends the dragon away from Smurf Village.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Lost City Of Yore: Curiosity brings Nosey Smurf to the lair of the Hag Sisters, who want to find the terrifying Sceptre of Yore... And Gargamel wants to cheat the two witches as he tries to destroy the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Incredible Shrinking Wizard: Gargamel has thrown in his slime pond so much poisonous muck that the water becomes enchanted and Gargamel, after falling in, suddenly finds himself much smaller that he would wish. Actually he is going to be so small that Papa Smurf will save him!

programme.title: Snappy's Way
programme.desc: Did you know that if you catch a troll, he may grant you one wish? It just happens that Aloysius the Troll gets caught in one of Gargamel's Smurf traps. Snappy Smurf sets him free and as a reward, gets to make all other Smurfs obey his every whim. Now this brings a lot of trouble to the Smurfs, as Smurflings, sometimes, ask for things that are not good for them... or anybody else.

programme.title: Reckless Smurfs
programme.desc: This time, Gargamel's plan cannot fail. Undeterred by Azrael's derisive cackling, the evil wizard perfects a magic substance called Daredevil Dust, which is going to change all the Smurfs into rash, incautious swashbucklers. Will Papa Smurf fall into Gargamel's trap? Will their enemy catch all the Smurfs? Will this story have a happy ending?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Winged Wizard: Determined to fly over Smurf village to catch a Smurf to take to the Wizard's Convention, Gargamel invokes his Book of Spells to help him. A series of funny flying machine mishaps occur and Gargamel is once more the laughing stock of the Wizard's Convention.

programme.title: Smurf Box Derby
programme.desc: Handy Smurf makes another invention: the Smurfmobile. Each Smurf has his – or her – customized vehicle and all, or almost all, the Smurfs enjoy a little spin... But then the evil wizard Gargamel gets hold of the idea and starts making trouble for the Smurfs...

programme.title: Spelunking Smurfs
programme.desc: The starving Smurfs discover a cave that has a stash of frozen food inside guarded by an equally frozen troll who was imprisoned because of his greed by a magic diamond. As the Smurfs defrost the cave, Gargamel steals the food, but the magic diamond transforms him into an icy mass and the freed troll happily helps the Smurfs carry the food back to their village.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Lure Of The Orb: Allura the Enchantress possesses a very special magic orb whose energy, as she says, can lift spirits and inspire the uninspired! All you have to do is hold the orb between your hands... It is true the orb bestows inspiration, up to a point. But its side effects can be very dangerous, as the Smurfs find out when they become addicted to it...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Handy's Sweetheart: Handy learns it's better to have smurfed than not to have smurfed at all when he learns his true love is really a mermaid. Can they really live with each other forever?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfily Ever After: The boy from the wood and Laconia, the deaf-mute elf, ask Papa Smurf to celebrate their wedding. The Smurfs are getting the party ready, following the advice of the Smurfette, when Gargamel comes to put a spoke in their wheel.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Put Upon Puppy: Life in the Smurf Village might be more peaceful if Puppy's behavior were a little more considerate. But the little Smurf dog is digging up Smurfette's flowers, dirtying Vanity's new wallpaper or ruining Papa Smurf's experiments. Yet Puppy's going to help the Smurfs out of a trap contrived by Gargamel... Or maybe he won't be disciplined enough...

programme.title: All Creatures Great And Smurf
programme.desc: Nat Smurf is convinced he can help all creatures with his healing ways, even the wicked Azrael after he gets his paw caught in a trap. He heals well, but even though he is tempted to stay with the Smurfs, he runs back to Gargamel while leading his old master away from Smurf Village.

programme.title: The Man In The Moon
programme.desc: Sick and tired of not being appreciated, the Man in the Moon quits his job and retires on Earth, to the Village of the Smurfs. The absence of a First Quarter Moon wreaks havoc in the customs of the Smurfs, and Mother Nature and Father Time get dragged in...

programme.title: Hefty And The Wheelsmurfer
programme.desc: Hefty Smurf learns what is to be handicapped when he breaks his leg. Handy Smurf creates the wheelsmurfer for him, a contraption that will give Hefty some mobility. But suddenly the evil wizard Gargamel appears on the scene.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Baby's First Christmas: The wonderful joy of Christmas for Baby Smurf and everyone else is almost ruined by the evil Chlorhydris who puts a spell on Mr. Nicholas to stop him from spreading holiday cheer. Fortunately, Papa Smurf and his little blue creatures break the spell and Christmas spreads over the land once more.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Littlest Giant: Simon is lost in the forest and in search of his parents. Simon is the son of a couple of giants. The Smurfs try to bring him home, but then Gargamel interrupts the party.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Comet Is Coming!: Papa's note to the Smurfs about viewing a comet is delivered torn. The Smurfs read only the first part and think their world is coming to an end. They plan how to spend their last day until Papa returns to clear up the misunderstanding and assure them that they are safe.

programme.title: All The News That's Fit To Smurf
programme.desc: Curious Smurf has an idea: why not print a sheet with all the Village news? He's sure to interest all his readers of the Smurf Tattler. But things don't go exactly to plan when Papa finds super smurfberries.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfing For Gold: Gargamel the evil wizard is in trouble again. If he can't find an enormous amount of gold by sundown, all his possessions will be taken away from him. But the Smurfs are going to help their arch-enemy... Up to a point.

programme.title: To Smurf A Thief
programme.desc: The Smurfs and Homnibus befriend an unfortunate boy who is forced to steal for his master. Soon, the evil thief is turned over to the magistrate and the boy is happy to live with Homnibus.

programme.title: The Kaplowey Scroll
programme.desc: There is a terrifying magic word. When you direct the word at something or someone, you make it vanish into nothingness! Can the Smurfs undo its evil power before Gargamel gets hold of it?

programme.title: The Gallant Smurf
programme.desc: Queen Felicity will not let her son, Prince Godfrey, marry his sweetheart Pricilla. What she wants as a daughter-in-law is a girl who shows her something she's never seen before. When Hogatha learns of this, and also discovers the existence of Grandpa Smurf, she feels confident that she can surprise the Queen with her capture. Of course, Hogatha must first capture Grandpa Smurf...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Sky Is Smurfing: Scaredy Smurf runs into the Village screaming about the sky being about to smurf down. And just at the same moment, Papa Smurf is beset by uncontrollable fits of sneezing...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Tattle-Tail Smurfs: Brainy Smurf's had enough. The Smurflings and Sassette keep on telling tales about him with unpleasant results. He therefore concocts a magic formula, taken from Papa Smurf's books of spells, which makes the little Smurfs' tails grow longer and longer every time they tell tales. What he hasn't counted on is that Gargamel now has a way of catching the Smurflings.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Now You Smurf 'Em, Now You Don't: The underground trolls who want them to be their slaves capture the Smurfs. Papa Smurf ingeniously frees them and then destroys the trolls' magic crystal ball that gives them power over the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Handy's Sweetheart: Handy learns it's better to have smurfed than not to have smurfed at all when he learns his true love is really a mermaid. Can they really live with each other forever?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette's Dancing Shoes: An evil imp gives Smurfette dancing shoes and then tricks her into promising to marry him. All her little friends rush to her rescue and Papa Smurf magically puts the dancing shoes on the imp. He is forced to dance off into the night.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Pussywillow Pixies: Clumsy Smurf's misadventures take him across a river into Pussywillow Hollow. There he meets the Pixies – charming and shapely beings whose enemies, the Wartmongers, will meet the Smurfs in some unforeseen ways.

programme.title: The Whole Smurf And Nothing But The Smurf
programme.desc: The evil wizard Gargamel is able to capture the Smurfette. Now he is going to give her a truth serum and know all of Papa Smurf' secrets… But then Gargamel makes a big mistake and gives the Smurfette a fib formula!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Unsound Smurf: In an effort to give Papa some quiet time, Brainy uses one of Papa's spells to create a magical sound barrier around the village. Papa cannot reverse the spell and sends the Smurflings, who are trapped outside the Village, to a noisemaker. Baby takes a bottle of sound from the noisemaker, which breaks the barrier.

programme.title: Spelunking Smurfs
programme.desc: The starving Smurfs discover a cave that has a stash of frozen food inside guarded by an equally frozen troll who was imprisoned because of his greed by a magic diamond. As the Smurfs defrost the cave, Gargamel steals the food, but the magic diamond transforms him into an icy mass and the freed troll happily helps the Smurfs carry the food back to their village.

programme.title: Episode 27

programme.title: Manchester United / Sunderland
programme.desc: La saison 2025/2026 de la Premier League s'annonce passionnante. Liverpool, tenant du titre, cherchera à prolonger sa domination, tandis qu'Arsenal, Manchester City et Chelsea ambitionnent de bousculer la hiérarchie. Avec des outsiders prêts à créer la surprise, chaque journée promet suspense et intensité dans l'un des championnats les plus disputés au monde.

programme.title: Late Football Club
programme.desc: Nicolas Tourriol et les journalistes et consultants CANAL+ reviennent sur l’actualité du foot. Au programme : des infos mercato, des reportages, des interviews.

programme.title: Histoire de Champions - Saison 4
programme.desc: S4 Retour sur les plus beaux matchs de l'histoire de la Ligue des Champions, avec les exploits des clubs français, l'OL de Juninho, les premiers pas du jeune Mbappé avec l'AS Monaco, l'OM qui renverse Dortmund ou encore le PSG plus que jamais proche du Graal. Mais aussi des soirées sur les plus grands clubs de la compétition, sur les plus grandes stars ou encore des soirées thématiques.

programme.title: Leeds / Tottenham
programme.desc: La saison 2025/2026 de la Premier League s'annonce passionnante. Liverpool, tenant du titre, cherchera à prolonger sa domination, tandis qu'Arsenal, Manchester City et Chelsea ambitionnent de bousculer la hiérarchie. Avec des outsiders prêts à créer la surprise, chaque journée promet suspense et intensité dans l'un des championnats les plus disputés au monde.

programme.title: FC Nantes / Paris FC
programme.desc: Auréolées d'un 18ᵉ titre de championnes de France, le quatrième de rang, les Lyonnaises, désormais dirigées par Jonatan Giraldez, repartent à la conquête d'un nouveau sacre. Cette saison 2025/2026 de Première Ligue devrait se résumer encore à un duel entre Lyon et le Paris-SG, à moins que le Paris FC, Fleury ou Dijon ne viennent jouer les trouble-fêtes.

programme.title: Late Football Club
programme.desc: Nicolas Tourriol et les journalistes et consultants CANAL+ reviennent sur l’actualité du foot. Au programme : des infos mercato, des reportages, des interviews.

programme.title: Jour de foot
programme.desc: Analyse des rencontres. Tour des stades avec les envoyés spéciaux de CANAL+ pour découvrir ce qui s'est passé et recueillir les toutes premières réactions des acteurs.

programme.title: Le Club - Saison 1
programme.desc: S1 E1 L'histoire d'un club de football, le FC Versailles, en pleine transformation, entre ambitions sportives, paris audacieux et héritage royal. Structuré autour d'un trio de propriétaires, Alexandre Mulliez, Fabien Lazare et le pilote Pierre Gasly, le club de foot veut se réinventer avec l'aide de ces trois actionnaires, qui ont fixé un objectif : hisser le FC Versailles parmi les clubs de premier plan et éviter l'enfer de la relégation.

programme.title: Aston Villa / Burnley
programme.desc: C'est un match de bas de tableau qui est proposé au Villa Park, entre deux formations qui ont plutôt mal débuté leur saison en championnat : Aston Villa et Burnley. Eliminé en Coupe de la Ligue par Brentford et toujours en course en Ligue Europa, Ollie Watkins et les Villans doivent repartir de l'avant en Premier League, afin de s'éloigner de la zone rouge.

programme.title: Inside Ze Club - Saison 2
programme.desc: S2 Des reportages au coeur des clubs de Premier League pour aller à la rencontre des supporters et des personnes qui en constituent l'écosystème, tout en racontant l'histoire de chacune de ces structures.

programme.title: Chelsea / Liverpool
programme.desc: Déjà leaders au terme de la 4e journée de championnat, les Reds de Liverpool, emmenés par Mohamed Salah, accueillent les Blues de Chelsea, dans leur antre d'Anfield, pour l'une des belles affiches de ce début de saison. Si Liverpool a bien débuté son parcours en Champions League en écartant l'Atlético Madrid (3-2), il n'en est pas de même pour Chelsea, battu par le Bayern Munich (3-1).

programme.title: Newcastle / Nottingham Forest
programme.desc: Après un intermède en Ligue des champions, avec un déplacement à l'Union Saint-Gilloise, les Magpies de Newcastle retrouvent les terrains de la Premier League, avec la réception de Nottingham Forest, à St. James' Park. De leur côté, les Reds de Nottingham Forest disputaient un match de Ligue Europa, il y a trois jours, contre les Danois de Midtjylland.

programme.title: Paris-SG / Dijon
programme.desc: Après un déplacement périlleux à Lyon, la semaine dernière, les filles du PSG accueillent Dijon, battu par le Paris FC (2-0) lors de la première journée, puis vainqueur de Montpellier (2-1). Tenues en échec à Lens (1-1), en ouverture de saison, Sakina Karchaoui et les Parisiennes se sont ensuite rattrapées en dominant Nantes (5-2). Elles sont les grandes favorites face aux Dijonnaises.

programme.desc: Nicolas Tourriol et les journalistes et consultants CANAL+ reviennent sur l’actualité du foot. Au programme : des infos mercato, des reportages, des interviews.

programme.title: Samir Nasri : Rebelle
programme.desc: Ramasseur de balle au stade Vélodrome avant d'en devenir le Petit Prince sous le maillot de l'Olympique de Marseille, Samir Nasri était destiné à devenir l'une des stars les plus adulées du football français. Mais dans un monde où la norme est de rentrer dans le rang et de choisir ses mots, le surdoué aura fini par traîner une réputation d'effronté, voire d'incontrôlable.

programme.title: Canal Foot Manager
programme.desc: Une collection centrée sur le décryptage tactique dans le football. Palettes immersives et analyses, Gauthier Kuntzmann livre les clés des méthodes utilisées par les coachs.

programme.title: 30/05/2026 : En Route pour Budapest : Episode 4 : Marseille - Ajax Amsterdam. Episode 4 : Marseille - Ajax Amsterdam
programme.desc: La finale de l'UEFA Champions League 2025/2026 se tiendra le 30 mai 2026 au stade Ferenc-Puskas à Budapest en Hongrie : retour sur les étapes du parcours des clubs européens.

programme.title: FC Barcelone / Paris-SG
programme.desc: Revoilà donc un choc devenu un classique de la Ligue des champions entre le Barça et le PSG : les coéquipiers de Lamine Yamal espèrent surprendre le champion en titre !

programme.title: Premier League Review : 7e journée
programme.desc: Le magazine Premier League Review présente sous forme de résumés les meilleures rencontres du championnat d'Angleterre ces dernières semaines : tous les moments les plus importants sont analysés et les buts les plus spectaculaires sont montrés en images.

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Nos programmes se terminent pour cette journée, en attendant ceux de demain.

programme.title: Histoire de Champions - Saison 4
programme.desc: S4 Retour sur les plus beaux matchs de l'histoire de la Ligue des Champions, avec les exploits des clubs français, l'OL de Juninho, les premiers pas du jeune Mbappé avec l'AS Monaco, l'OM qui renverse Dortmund ou encore le PSG plus que jamais proche du Graal. Mais aussi des soirées sur les plus grands clubs de la compétition, sur les plus grandes stars ou encore des soirées thématiques.

programme.title: Lyon / Salzbourg
programme.desc: Après un premier déplacement à Utrecht, conclu par une victoire (0-1), les Gones de l'OL accueillent maintenant les Autrichiens de Salzbourg dans cette 2e journée de Ligue Europa.

programme.title: FC Nantes / Paris FC
programme.desc: Auréolées d'un 18ᵉ titre de championnes de France, le quatrième de rang, les Lyonnaises, désormais dirigées par Jonatan Giraldez, repartent à la conquête d'un nouveau sacre. Cette saison 2025/2026 de Première Ligue devrait se résumer encore à un duel entre Lyon et le Paris-SG, à moins que le Paris FC, Fleury ou Dijon ne viennent jouer les trouble-fêtes.

programme.title: Canal Foot Manager
programme.desc: Une collection centrée sur le décryptage tactique dans le football. Palettes immersives et analyses, Gauthier Kuntzmann livre les clés des méthodes utilisées par les coachs.

programme.title: FC Barcelone / Paris-SG
programme.desc: Revoilà donc un choc devenu un classique de la Ligue des champions entre le Barça et le PSG : les coéquipiers de Lamine Yamal espèrent surprendre le champion en titre !

programme.title: Monaco / Manchester City
programme.desc: Après un premier déplacement à Bruges, l'AS Monaco retrouve son public du stade Louis-II pour une affiche de prestige face aux Anglais de Manchester City, à l'occasion de cette 2e journée de la phase de Ligue de la Champions League. Il y a 8 ans, les Monégasques s'étaient qualifiés pour les quarts de finale de la compétition, après avoir éliminé les Citizens au terme d'un match fou remporté (3-1), grâce notamment à un but d'un certain Kylian Mbappé.

programme.title: Marseille / Ajax Amsterdam
programme.desc: En 2023, au bout d'un match fou, l'Olympique de Marseille avait arraché un succès précieux au Vélodrome face à l'Ajax Amsterdam en Ligue Europa (4-3). Deux ans plus tard, les Phocéens affrontent le même adversaire, mais cette fois en Ligue des champions. Après un match périlleux au Real Madrid, lors la première journée, Mason Greenwood et l'OM retrouvent leur public du Vélodrome pour leur grand retour en Champions League.

programme.title: Détective Mathoux : Emission du 14 sept. 2025
programme.desc: S2 La carrière d'un footballeur est riche de moments de sport. Elle est aussi, parfois jalonnée de certaines affaires, avec les coachs, les partenaires, les supporters. C'est là qu'intervient le détective Mathoux. Accompagné d'un assistant chargé de contrôler les variations d'un détecteur de mensonge et de collecter toutes sortes de pièces à conviction, le perspicace détective mène l'enquête pour révéler tous les secrets de la carrière du prévenu.

programme.desc: Hollywood celebrities give insight into their personal and professional lives, and open up about upcoming projects.

programme.title: Hollywood One on One
programme.desc: Hollywood celebrities give insight into their personal and professional lives, and open up about upcoming projects.

programme.title: Mister Roberts
programme.desc: Bittersweet film about a supply officer aboard a decrepit cargo ship during World War II who yearns for a transfer into a combat zone but is thwarted by the ship's captain, a petty tyrant. Forced to endure various humiliations in exchange for privileges, the crew engage in minor acts of resistance, and look to Mr. Roberts for inspiration and moral support. Based on the hit Broadway play.

programme.title: Julius Caesar
programme.desc: Brutus (James Mason) is convinced by a scheming band of Roman senators, led by Caius Cassius (John Gielgud), that his dear friend Julius Caesar (Louis Calhern) intends to dissolve the republic and install himself as monarch, and he joins a conspiracy to assassinate him. Brutus stirringly defends his actions, but when Mark Antony (Marlon Brando) responds with a speech that plays upon the crowd's love for their fallen leader, a battle between the two factions is assured.

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: In 1939, newly created British intelligence agency MI6 recruits Cambridge mathematics alumnus Alan Turing (Benedict Cumberbatch) to crack Nazi codes, including Enigma -- which cryptanalysts had thought unbreakable. Turing's team, including Joan Clarke (Keira Knightley), analyze Enigma messages while he builds a machine to decipher them. Turing and team finally succeed and become heroes, but in 1952, the quiet genius encounters disgrace when authorities reveal he is gay and send him to prison.

programme.title: The Maltese Falcon
programme.desc: In this noir classic, detective Sam Spade (Humphrey Bogart) gets more than he bargained for when he takes a case brought to him by a beautiful but secretive woman (Mary Astor). As soon as Miss Wonderly shows up, trouble follows as Sam's partner is murdered and Sam is accosted by a man (Peter Lorre) demanding he locate a valuable statuette. Sam, entangled in a dangerous web of crime and intrigue, soon realizes he must find the one thing they all seem to want: the bejeweled Maltese falcon.

programme.title: La Ventana
programme.desc: When young Tommy (Bobby Driscoll) sneaks out of his bedroom and onto the fire escape of his tenement building, he sees two neighbors, Joe (Paul Stewart) and Jean Kellerson (Ruth Roman), murder a sailor (Richard Benedict). Tommy, who has been reprimanded before by his parents for telling phony stories, informs his mother (Barbara Hale) of the crime, but she does not believe him. After his mother leaves to attend to a sick relative, Tommy worries that the Kellersons will try to kill him, too.

programme.title: StarDog and TurboCat
programme.desc: Launched into space in 1969, a loyal dog crash-lands in a small town where pets are no longer welcome. Desperate and confused, he soon recruits the help of a tech-savvy cat to help him reunite with his beloved owner.

programme.title: The Philadelphia Story
programme.desc: This classic romantic comedy focuses on Tracy Lord (Katharine Hepburn), a Philadelphia socialite who has split from her husband, C.K. Dexter Haven (Cary Grant), due both to his drinking and to her overly demanding nature. As Tracy prepares to wed the wealthy George Kittredge (John Howard), she crosses paths with both Dexter and prying reporter Macaulay Connor (James Stewart). Unclear about her feelings for all three men, Tracy must decide whom she truly loves.

programme.title: The Brink
programme.desc: A reckless police inspector is on a mission to crack down on a criminal's gold smuggling scheme.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: Based on a story by famed science fiction writer Philip K. Dick, "Minority Report" is an action-detective thriller set in Washington D.C. in 2054, where police utilize a psychic technology to arrest and convict murderers before they commit their crime. Tom Cruise plays the head of this Precrime unit and is himself accused of the future murder of a man he hasn't even met.

programme.title: Rachel, Rachel
programme.desc: Written off as a spinster, 35-year-old schoolteacher Rachel Cameron (Joanne Woodward) lives with her widowed mother above a funeral parlor in rural Connecticut. Repressed by the community and given to despondency, Rachel spends her time daydreaming, buoyed by her lesbian best friend, Calla (Estelle Parsons). A religious experience begins a subtle awakening in Rachel, and when a childhood friend returns to town for his father's funeral, she experiences real, driving passion.

programme.title: The Brink
programme.desc: A reckless police inspector is on a mission to crack down on a criminal's gold smuggling scheme.

programme.title: Paradox - Kill Zone Bangkok
programme.desc: A tough Hong Kong cop's teenage daughter disappears in Pattaya. He goes to Thailand to find her and must deal with corrupt cops, but an honest one helps him track down culprits involved in illegal organ trafficking.

programme.title: Back to Bataan
programme.desc: This World War II film sees American army colonel Joseph Madden (John Wayne) stationed in the Philippines with much of his military support forced out of the region by Japanese troops. Despite the grim situation, the tenacious Madden attempts to rally Filipino guerrilla fighters to continue assaults on the Japanese. Among Madden's band of soldiers is Captain Andres Bonifacio (Anthony Quinn), who struggles with the burden of being the grandson of a war hero.

programme.title: Brothers Karamazov
programme.desc: Based on Fyodor Dostoevsky's novel, Fyodor Karamazov (Lee J. Cobb) is a wealthy and controlling father who must choose an heir among his four sons. Dmitri (Yul Brynner), the oldest son, is engaged to Katya (Claire Bloom) but starts seeing his father's mistress, Grushenka (Maria Schell). The other brothers, Ivan (Richard Basehart), Alexey (William Shatner) and half-brother Smerdyakov (Albert Salmi), all have designs on the inheritance, ultimately leading to betrayal and murder.

programme.title: Quo Vadis
programme.desc: Returning from a military campaign abroad, General Marcus Vinicius (Robert Taylor) discovers that a new religion has taken hold in Rome: Christianity. When Vinicius encounters Lygia (Deborah Kerr), a follower of the strange religion, he quickly becomes smitten and tries to win her affections. Lygia is reluctant due to their differing beliefs. Complicating matters is the crazed Emperor Nero (Peter Ustinov), who blames the Christians for his own burning of Rome, beginning a wave of persecution.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: Based on a story by famed science fiction writer Philip K. Dick, "Minority Report" is an action-detective thriller set in Washington D.C. in 2054, where police utilize a psychic technology to arrest and convict murderers before they commit their crime. Tom Cruise plays the head of this Precrime unit and is himself accused of the future murder of a man he hasn't even met.

programme.desc: Matías Franco is a lobbyist, manager of interests who works for individuals, companies and corporations. He is dedicated to pressuring his contacts in power to do business with his clients.

programme.title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
programme.desc: Nick Smith (Cecil Kellaway), a middle-aged roadside diner owner, hires a drifter, Frank Chambers (John Garfield), to work at his restaurant. Frank quickly begins an affair with Nick's beautiful young wife, Cora (Lana Turner), and the two conspire to kill Nick and seize his assets. When they succeed, local prosecutor Kyle Sackett (Leon Ames) becomes suspicious, but is unable to build a solid case. However, the couple soon realizes that no misdeed ever goes truly unpunished.

programme.title: Infection
programme.desc: A man races against time to save his son when a new rabies virus turns people into rampaging zombies in Venezuela.

programme.title: A Face in the Crowd
programme.desc: Ambitious young radio producer Marcia Jeffries (Patricia Neal) finds a charming rogue named Larry "Lonesome" Rhodes (Andy Griffith) in an Arkansas drunk tank and puts him on the air. Soon, Rhodes' local popularity gets him an appearance on television in Memphis, which he parlays into national network stardom that he uses to endorse a presidential candidate for personal gain. But the increasingly petulant star's ego, arrogance and womanizing threaten his rise to the top.

programme.title: Top Hat
programme.desc: The story centers on wealthy Dale Tremont (Ginger Rogers), on holiday in London and Venice. She assumes that American entertainer Jerry Travers (Fred Astaire) is the husband of her friend Madge (Helen Broderick) -- who's actually the wife of Jerry's business manager Horace Hardwick (Edward Everett Horton).

programme.title: Beasts That Cling to the Straw
programme.desc: The destinies of numerous lowlifes converge and come crashing down.

programme.title: Easter Parade
programme.desc: In this lavish musical, Broadway star Don Hewes' (Fred Astaire) dancing partner (Ann Miller) goes solo, and Don declares that he can make a hit performer out of the next dancer he sees. This turns out to be the inexperienced Hannah (Judy Garland), who bristles as Don tries to make her into his old partner. But as he realizes that he is falling in love with Hannah, Don knows that he must let her grow into her own kind of dancer if he wants her to reach her full potential.

programme.title: Esperando la carroza
programme.desc: Mama Cora's four children argue over who should be forced to care for her in her old age.

programme.title: The Day They Robbed the Bank of England
programme.desc: An Irish patriot (Aldo Ray) and his 1901 gang use an old sewer to reach Bank of England gold bullion.

programme.title: East of Eden
programme.desc: In this film based on John Steinbeck's epic novel, Cal Trask (James Dean), the son of a California farmer (Raymond Massey), feels that his father cares only about his brother, Aron (Richard Davalos). When Cal embarks on a business venture to gain the favor of his dad, he finds himself dealing with his estranged mother (Jo Van Fleet), now the owner of a brothel, and tensions in the family rise even further when he begins to fall for Aron's girlfriend, Abra (Julie Harris).

programme.title: Taxi 5
programme.desc: A Marseille police officer must take down a group of Italian robbers who drive powerful Ferraris with the older niece of Daniel, the driver of the legendary white taxi.

programme.title: Mr. and Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: When David Smith (Robert Montgomery) concedes to his wife, Ann (Carole Lombard), that he's not quite satisfied with their marriage, the couple's relationship spins into disarray. In the wake of David's confession, Ann learns that because of a legal snafu, they're not actually married. Ann uses her freedom to try the dating market, where she's courted by Jeff Custer (Gene Raymond), one of David's professional colleagues. David's attempts to win her back lead to several humorous situations.

programme.title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
programme.desc: Nick Smith (Cecil Kellaway), a middle-aged roadside diner owner, hires a drifter, Frank Chambers (John Garfield), to work at his restaurant. Frank quickly begins an affair with Nick's beautiful young wife, Cora (Lana Turner), and the two conspire to kill Nick and seize his assets. When they succeed, local prosecutor Kyle Sackett (Leon Ames) becomes suspicious, but is unable to build a solid case. However, the couple soon realizes that no misdeed ever goes truly unpunished.

programme.title: La Furia
programme.desc: Charges of possible drug trafficking strain the relationship between a federal judge and his son.

programme.title: A Face in the Crowd

But the increasingly petulant star's ego, arrogance and womanizing threaten his rise to the top.

programme.title: The Wrong Man
programme.desc: Musician Manny Balestrero (Henry Fonda) needs money to pay for his wife Rose's (Vera Miles) dental procedure. When he tries to borrow money from their insurance policy, someone at the office mistakes him for a man who had robbed them twice at gunpoint. After Manny is arrested, his defense attorney, Frank O'Connor (Anthony Quayle), works to demonstrate that Manny has an alibi for the crimes. The stress of the case, however, threatens to destroy Manny's family before his name can be cleared.

programme.desc: Uptight IRS man Lorenzo Charlton (Tony Randall) is ordered to investigate rural rancher Pop Larkin (Paul Douglas), who is significantly in debt to the government. Some moonshine, however, and Pop's lovely daughter, Mariette (Debbie Reynolds), help Lorenzo learn to relax, and he decides to help the Larkins' find a legal loophole.

programme.desc: Die junge Therapeutin Claire wird nach einem Flugzeugabsturz von ihrem Chef beauftragt die sechs Überlebenden des Unfalls zu betreuen. Als diese ihre Erinnerungen an den Unfall zusammentragen - welcher laut den Insassen auch eine Explosion beinhalten soll, die die Airline jedoch abstreitet - ist Claire von dem geheimnisvollen Patienten, Eric, fasziniert. Als dann Claires professionelle Beziehung zu Eric - gegen ihr besseres Wissen – in einer Romanze endet, verschwinden die Überlebenden plötzlich nacheinander auf mysteriöse Weise. Claire vermutet das Eric alle Antworten auf ihre Fragen hat und ist entschlossen die Wahrheit über den Absturz herauszufinden, koste es was es wolle.

programme.desc: For the past year, DEA agent Bobby Trench (Denzel Washington) and U.S. Navy intelligence officer Marcus Stigman (Mark Wahlberg) have been working under cover as members of a narcotics syndicate. The twist: Neither man knows that the other is an undercover agent. When their attempt to infiltrate a Mexican drug cartel and recover millions goes haywire, the men are disavowed by their superiors. Trench and Stigman must go on the run lest they wind up in jail or in a grave.

programme.title: Bait
programme.desc: Landing in jail for a petty theft crime, Alvin finds himself sharing a cell with John Jaster, the incarcerated half of the pair of high-tech thieves responsible for the missing gold. His partner, Bristol, is still at large. Alvin wants only to get out of prison and start fresh with his girlfriend, Lisa, and when the Feds, led by U.S. Treasury investigator Clenteen, set him loose on a sketchy deal, he thinks his luck has changed. Alvin has his freedom and the Feds have found their bait.
