Now originating from one of the SEC Network studios in Charlotte, N.C., the show is a forum for lively discussion and debate of all things SEC and across the spectrum of college sports, with Finebaum playing the role of both moderator and provocateur. The show airs weekday afternoons throughout the year on SEC Network.

programme.desc: A serial killer with a history of serial rape terrorizes Tampa, Florida's red light district, targeting women of night at random, getting away with murder for months, only to be brought to justice by the one victim he let go.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: The murder of a millionaire doctor's wife sets off a massive manhunt throughout New England; law enforcement quickly locates the suspected killer only to find out he has a history of not only violence but also cross-dressing.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: An unemployed teen mom and her new husband concoct a plan to kill an innocent man they meet on Craigslist, resulting in a vicious stabbing that sends shock waves through a small Pennsylvania community.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A father, husband and businessman is actually a sadomasochistic con-man who lures unsuspecting women with a web of lies and empty promises only to trap them in a world of sex slavery and murder.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A wayward, homeless ex-marine drifts through central Oregon, committing petty crimes here and there, until he spots Amyjane and gets the urge to kill.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: Two prominent doctors, two towns apart, are entangled in a passionate rivalry for the same woman's affections.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Rumours
programme.desc: Leaders of the world's wealthiest democracies become spectacles of incompetence, contending with increasingly surreal obstacles as night falls in the misty woods and they realise they are suddenly alone.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that he is about to cause.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: You've Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters who have attacked New York.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film `Saturday Night', we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including `Wayne's World', `Bridesmaids' and more.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friend's wedding in Singapore. She's also surprised to learn that Nick's family is extremely wealthy and he's considered one of the country's most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nick's disapproving mother.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: It's Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their son's college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydia's life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuice's name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: Two Weeks Notice
programme.desc: An ambitious law graduate decides to leave her job as she feels her skills are not appreciated by her boss, who basically treats her like his PA. However, he won't let her go that easily.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss and can't remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that he's in it for love.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once he's had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newton's wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friend's wedding in Singapore. She's also surprised to learn that Nick's family is extremely wealthy and he's considered one of the country's most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nick's disapproving mother.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that he is about to cause.

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: Jack Malik is a struggling singer-songwriter in an English seaside town whose dreams of fame are rapidly fading, despite the fierce devotion and support of his childhood best friend, Ellie. After a freak bus accident during a mysterious global blackout, Jack wakes up to discover that The Beatles have never existed. Performing songs by the greatest band in history to a world that has never heard them, Jack becomes on overnight sensation with a little help from his agent.

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2
programme.desc: Father and stepfather Dusty and Brad join forces to make Christmastime perfect for the children. Their newfound partnership soon gets put to the test when Dusty's old-school, macho dad and Brad's gentle father arrive to turn the holiday upside down. After a sudden change in plans, the four men decide to take the kids to a luxury resort for a fun-filled getaway that turns into a hilarious and chaotic adventure.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: When a new student joins her college's female a cappella group, she takes the women out of their comfort zone of traditional pieces and introduces them to innovative arrangements.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon can't let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a plot by a dangerous criminal organisation endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesn't need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film `Saturday Night', we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including `Wayne's World', `Bridesmaids' and more.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters who have attacked New York.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: New student Cady Heron gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics, ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George. However, when Cady makes the major misstep of falling for Regina's ex-boyfriend, she soon finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Foregone Conclusion.' However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now' style documentary.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: A girl who's sick of the social strictures of junior high is transformed into a grownup overnight. In this feel-good fairy tale, teenager Jenna wants a boyfriend, and when she's unable to find one, she fantasizes about being a well-adjusted adult. Suddenly, her secret desire becomes a reality, and she is transformed into a 30-year-old. However, adulthood, with its own set of male-female challenges, isn't as easy as it looks.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: When a scandal threatens to completely derail the Barden Bellas, now graduating seniors, the women must get their act together and redeem themselves at the world championships in Copenhagen, Denmark.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys'. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each other's throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he can't skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his gran's house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he can't putt and the golfing establishment aren't happy to have him around.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that he is about to cause.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncle's company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds' inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss and can't remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that he's in it for love.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friend's wedding in Singapore. She's also surprised to learn that Nick's family is extremely wealthy and he's considered one of the country's most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nick's disapproving mother.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: After the highs of winning the world championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart. But when they get the chance to reunite for an overseas USO tour, this group of awesome nerds will come together to make some music one last time.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Billy is the son of hotel chain magnate Brian Madison and expects to inherit the family fortune, but he's shocked when his father stipulates he won't unless he passes 12th grade in just 24 weeks. It will be tough, since he never passed 1st grade. Determined to prove his father wrong, Billy enrols at school.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In an update of the 1966 Lewis Gilbert version, the eponymous Alfie is transposed to Manhattan and working as a chauffeur. His conquests include older woman Liz, lonely Nikki and Lonette, his best friend's girl. However, he begins to learn bitter truths about himself and the way he treats women and, by the end of the film, he discovers a degree of humility.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the house's secrets and end the bloodshed.

programme.title: Code 3
programme.desc: On his final 24-hour shift, a burned-out paramedic is tasked with training his eager but inexperienced replacement. What starts as a routine night quickly spirals into a chaotic odyssey that tests their endurance, instincts and sense of humour.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her son's science teacher.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Marvin is a Milwaukee realtor who receives a crimson envelope from a former partner-in-crime whom he left for dead. He now finds himself thrust back into a world of ruthless hit men and double-crosses that turn his open houses into deadly war zones.

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: When a perfect night with a perfect stranger ends suddenly the next morning, Charlotte searches for answers and meaning in her life. However, she soon uncovers a shocking secret that changes everything she knows about the man who captured her heart.

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the girl of his dreams gets kidnapped, a man turns his inability to feel pain into an unexpected advantage as he fights a bunch of thugs to get her back.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her son's science teacher.

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force that's far beyond her control.

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: Attacked by an unseen animal, Blake and his family barricade themselves inside a farmhouse as the creature prowls the perimeter. As the night stretches on, however, he begins to behave strangely, transforming into something unrecognizable.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner
programme.desc: Exploring a 1,500-year-old monastery among the crags of the world-famous Skellig Islands. A look at Manx shearwaters and humpback whales, a chase after pygmy shrews on Clare, and a peek at an autumn spectacle on the Aran Islands.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: After scamming the town for wedding presents, Bart is sent to the Springfield Correctional Facility where he becomes friends with a tough inmate.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: One the eve of her wedding to Principal Skinner, Edna Krabappel hears that her fiancé's getting cold feet, so she calls it off. With Homer's help, can Seymour win back his lady?

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: The governor asks McGarrett and Grover to serve a warrant to a young computer hacker in order to protect national security.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: A secret service agent is murdered while the president is travelling to Oahu. Meanwhile, as Thanksgiving approaches, McGarrett's Aunt Deb visits and shares a stunning secret.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: Newcomer Jim Street jeopardises his spot on Hondo's team and the team searches for a ruthless drug trafficker who is using immigrants as couriers.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: When Marge and Homer are caught enjoying a romantic weekend in Miami instead of a boring family visit to Dayton, Bart and Lisa embark on a cross-country journey to hunt them down and ruin their holiday. Grandpa, abandoned in Miami, enjoys the company of gay Miami swinger Raoul.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart and Lisa try to outdo each other with scary Halloween stories.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Michael tries to give Stanley an attitude adjustment after Stanley snaps at him, Dwight decides to buy Andy's car, and after spending the night at Jim's, Pam deals with an unexpected inconvenience.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Jim hits the golf course with Andy and Kevin in hope of landing a huge client, and Michael sets up a booth at a job fair at Pam's alma mater to hire a summer intern.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.desc: Jamie Redknapp and Micah Richards are put to the test in Southeast Asia with new challenges, joined by guests Maisie Adam and Mo Gilligan.

programme.title: Boyzone: No Matter What
programme.desc: The band parts ways, until Mikey proposes a Boyzone reunion. The comeback is a hit, but then tragedy strikes and the tabloids descend.

programme.desc: A school reunion transports the gang back to their past, where Ronnie faces an old bully, Erin springs into action, and Vinnie accompanies Davey to a peace meeting with Joey Kittens.

programme.desc: Bez, Clint Boon, Patsy Kensit and Danny Goffey join the regulars for the legendary pop culture panel show's revival, hosted by Greg Davies.

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm
programme.desc: With his friend in dire need of a kidney, Larry and Jeff argue about which of them should offer theirs. Plus, Larry aggravates two different receptionists.

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm

programme.desc: Eli has Rush's fate in his hands and has to make a difficult decision; suspicious Telford sends Young, Scott and Woolsey on a clandestine mission.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Toby leaves Dunder Mifflin and Michael plans a huge goodbye party out of joy. Angela refuses to help with it, so Michael turns to Phyllis. Elsewhere, Dwight and Meredith harass Holly, their new HR representative.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Lilly returns to work several weeks after being shot and tries to convince herself that she is emotionally ready to spearhead the reopening of the 1994 case of three slain boys.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Vengeful demon torments trapped sisters with their worst fears.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Phoebe opens a portal by repeatedly saving the life of her new boyfriend; a warlock steals the Book of Shadows and uses it to kill two of the Charmed Ones.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Cole attacks the Charmed Ones hoping that they will vanquish him forever; Paige is charged with the protection of a man who turns out to be the father she never knew.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A demon mummifies Phoebe's body to hold the spirit of his dead lover, Isis.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Cole kidnaps Phoebe and sends a shape-shifter in her place to manipulate Paige and Piper into giving him ownership of the manor.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Trying to win Phoebe in a twisted way, Cole casts a spell that alters reality, eliminating Paige and destroying the Power of Three.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Witch doctors lead the sisters astray using voodoo dolls; Paige abducts her ex-boyfriend's fiancee; Phoebe poses for a magazine centerfold; Piper nearly dismantles the house when she becomes an obsessive cleaner.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The sisters' nightmares spring to life, and they can escape only by unveiling the symbolic meaning of their dreams.

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: It's been nearly two years since Superman's (Henry Cavill) colossal battle with Zod (Michael Shannon) devastated the city of Metropolis. The loss of life and collateral damage left many feeling angry and helpless, including crime-fighting billionaire Bruce Wayne (Ben Affleck). Convinced that Superman is now a threat to humanity, Batman embarks on a personal vendetta to end his reign on Earth, while the conniving Lex Luthor (Jesse Eisenberg) launches his own crusade against the Man of Steel.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: When an asteroid threatens to collide with Earth, NASA honcho Dan Truman (Billy Bob Thornton) determines the only way to stop it is to drill into its surface and detonate a nuclear bomb. This leads him to renowned driller Harry Stamper (Bruce Willis), who agrees to helm the dangerous space mission provided he can bring along his own hotshot crew. Among them is the cocksure A.J. (Ben Affleck), who Harry thinks isn't good enough for his daughter (Liv Tyler), until the mission proves otherwise.

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: After making a speech in Moscow vowing to never negotiate with terrorists, President James Marshall boards Air Force One with his family and advisers. When a group of terrorists led by Ivan Korshunov hijacks the flight, the President's principles are put to the test. Feigning escape, ex-solider Marshall stows away in the aircraft and must race against time to rescue his family and everyone else on board.

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: Corrupt National Security Agency official Thomas Reynolds (Jon Voight) has a congressman assassinated to assure the passage of expansive new surveillance legislation. When a videotape of the murder ends up in the hands of Robert Clayton Dean (Will Smith), a labor lawyer and dedicated family man, he is framed for murder. With the help of ex-intelligence agent Edward "Brill" Lyle (Gene Hackman), Dean attempts to throw Reynolds off his trail and prove his innocence.

programme.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard
programme.desc: The world's top protection agent is called upon to guard the life of his mortal enemy, one of the world's most notorious hit men. The relentless bodyguard and manipulative assassin have been on the opposite end of the bullet for years and are thrown together for a wildly outrageous 24 hours. During their journey from England to the Hague, they encounter high-speed car chases, outlandish boat escapades and a merciless Eastern European dictator who is out for blood.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The team reopens the 1998 case of a reportedly promiscuous 15-year-old girl who was fatally beaten and found partially clothed.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The team reopens the case of an Amish teenager who was murdered just weeks after leaving home for Philadelphia to experience rumspringa.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The current investigation of a murdered man links to a cold case involving a young woman killed after leaving a political event on Election night.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Rush and Valens reopen the 1985 case of a wealthy stock broker killed during an apparent carjacking gone awry.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: A court psychologist asks Rush to investigate the homicide of a woman who was murdered in front of his client.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The team gets an anonymous letter saying the 1999 accidental death of a swim coach at a military academy was the result of a carefully orchestrated plot.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: DNA evidence prompts Rush and Valens to reopen the murder case of a beautiful 15-year-old girl who had a number of admirers, young and old.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Rush revisits her first crime scene when reopening a triple homicide case at a now-condemned restaurant in a blighted part of town.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: A reunion of World War II factory workers stirs up memories of a mysterious death, and a friend of the deceased begs Lilly to investigate the killing.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Lilly receives a home movie in which a runaway teen is apparently shot and killed, prompting her to take another look at the 1979 case.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Human bones are found at the site of a now shuttered prison, the scene of melee and murder 36 years before.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: During the approach of the most powerful storm in decades, university professor Dr. Jo Harding (Helen Hunt) and an underfunded team of students prepare the prototype for Dorothy, a ground-breaking tornado data-gathering device conceived by her estranged husband, Bill (Bill Paxton). When Harding tells Bill that Dorothy is ready for testing -- and that their privately funded rival Dr. Jonas Miller (Cary Elwes) has stolen the idea and built his own -- Bill rejoins the team for one last mission.

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: After making a speech in Moscow vowing to never negotiate with terrorists, President James Marshall boards Air Force One with his family and advisers. When a group of terrorists led by Ivan Korshunov hijacks the flight, the President's principles are put to the test. Feigning escape, ex-solider Marshall stows away in the aircraft and must race against time to rescue his family and everyone else on board.

programme.title: Live: U.S. Soccer Pregame
programme.desc: A preview of upcoming U.S. National Soccer team action.

programme.title: Live: Men's International Soccer Friendlies
programme.desc: From Q2 Stadium in Austin, Texas.

programme.title: Live: U.S. Soccer Postgame
programme.desc: Analysis and highlights from a U.S. national team soccer match.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: During the approach of the most powerful storm in decades, university professor Dr. Jo Harding (Helen Hunt) and an underfunded team of students prepare the prototype for Dorothy, a ground-breaking tornado data-gathering device conceived by her estranged husband, Bill (Bill Paxton). When Harding tells Bill that Dorothy is ready for testing -- and that their privately funded rival Dr. Jonas Miller (Cary Elwes) has stolen the idea and built his own -- Bill rejoins the team for one last mission.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, the city of Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people -- and then the surface world. Standing in his way is Arthur, Orm's half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne. With help from royal counselor Vulko, Arthur must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan and embrace his destiny as protector of the deep sea.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The team reopens the 1953 murder case of a 19-year-old aspiring rock 'n' roller when new evidence suggests he was not killed where his body was found.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: While investigating a Jane Doe's murder, the team discovers that she was a grifter with a male partner and numerous vengeful victims.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: A gold bracelet turns up, prompting Lilly to reopen the case of two Cambodian immigrants believed to have been murdered during a robbery.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The strangulation of a young woman mirrors the unsolved case of a 12-year-old girl in 1989, murdered at the home of a troubled teenager (Carly Schroeder).

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: A long-term AIDS survivor asks Rush and Valens to reopen the case involving his murdered partner, an AIDS activist and scorned member of a prominent family.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The communist witch hunts of the 1950s come back to haunt their survivors when Lilly and the team reopen an unsolved murder case.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Lily discovers nine decapitated female bodies while investigating a case originally sent to the Missing Persons Division in 1985.

programme.title: Big 12 Uncovered
programme.desc: We talk about headlines and unforgettable moments from the past.

programme.title: Live: Big 12 Football Pregame
programme.desc: Champ Bailey, Takeo Spikes, Victor Cruz and Adam Lefkoe preview the Big 12 football game of the week.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Cougars (4-1, 1-1 Big 12) clash with the Cowboys (1-4, 0-2) at Boone Pickens Stadium. Houston comes off a 35-11 setback to rival and then-No. 11 Texas Tech on Oct. 4. Oklahoma State is 0-2 since parting ways with longtime head coach Mike Gundy.

programme.title: Live: Big 12 Football Postgame
programme.desc: Champ Bailey, Takeo Spikes, Victor Cruz and Adam Lefkoe wrap up the night in the Big 12.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: The sequel to the Golden Globe-nominated and AFI Award-winning "The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring," "The Two Towers" follows the continuing quest of Frodo (Elijah Wood) and the Fellowship to destroy the One Ring. Frodo and Sam (Sean Astin) discover they are being followed by the mysterious Gollum. Aragorn (Viggo Mortensen), the Elf archer Legolas and Gimli the Dwarf encounter the besieged Rohan kingdom, whose once great King Theoden has fallen under Saruman's deadly spell.

programme.title: All Elite Wrestling: Collision
programme.desc: Orange Cassidy leads the Conglomeration in battle against the Don Callis Family; Kris Statlander is face-to-face with Toni Storm; Eddie Kingston vs. Dralístico; Jamie Hayter collides with Anna Jay; Kevin Knight faces a member of FTR.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, the city of Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people -- and then the surface world. Standing in his way is Arthur, Orm's half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne. With help from royal counselor Vulko, Arthur must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan and embrace his destiny as protector of the deep sea.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: Upset about moving from the big city to a small town, young Zach Cooper (Dylan Minnette) finds a silver lining when he meets his beautiful neighbor Hannah (Odeya Rush). The teen is surprised to learn that Hannah's mysterious father is R.L. Stine (Jack Black), the famous author of the best-selling "Goosebumps" series. When Zach accidentally unleashes the monsters from the fantastic tales, it's up to Stine, his daughter and Cooper to return the beasts back to the books where they belong.

programme.title: Happy Death Day 2U
programme.desc: Collegian Tree Gelbman wakes up in horror to learn that she's stuck in a parallel universe. Her boyfriend Carter is now with someone else, and her friends and fellow students seem to be completely different versions of themselves. When Tree discovers that Carter's roommate has been altering time, she finds herself once again the target of a masked killer. When the psychopath starts to go after her inner circle, Tree soon realizes that she must die over and over again to save everyone.

programme.title: The Blair Witch Project
programme.desc: Found video footage tells the tale of three film students (Heather Donahue, Joshua Leonard, Michael C. Williams) who've traveled to a small town to collect documentary footage about the Blair Witch, a legendary local murderer. Over the course of several days, the students interview townspeople and gather clues to support the tale's veracity. But the project takes a frightening turn when the students lose their way in the woods and begin hearing horrific noises.

programme.title: Drag Me to Hell
programme.desc: Christine Brown has a loving boyfriend and a good job at a Los Angeles bank. Her heavenly life becomes hellish when, in an effort to impress her boss, she denies an old woman's request for an extension on her home loan. In retaliation, the crone places a curse on Christine, threatening her soul with eternal damnation. Christine seeks a psychic's help to break the curse, but the price to save her soul may be more than she can pay.

programme.title: Silent House
programme.desc: Sarah (Elizabeth Olsen) is working with her father (Adam Trese) and uncle (Eric Sheffer Stevens) to renovate an old family home to prepare it for sale. Long vacant, the house has no utilities, forcing the trio to rely on battery-operated lanterns to light their way. Sarah becomes separated from her relatives and soon finds she is trapped inside the cabin, with no contact with the outside world. Panic turns to real terror as the young woman experiences events that become increasingly ominous.

programme.title: Brightburn
programme.desc: After a difficult struggle with fertility, Tori Breyer's dreams of motherhood come true with the arrival of a mysterious baby boy. Brandon appears to be everything Tori and her husband, Kyle, ever wanted -- bright, talented and curious about the world. But as Brandon nears puberty, powerful darkness manifests within him, and Tori becomes consumed by terrible doubts about her son. Once Brandon begins to act on his twisted urges, those closest to him find themselves in grave danger.

programme.title: Nope
programme.desc: A man and his sister discover something sinister in the skies above their California horse ranch, while the owner of a nearby theme park tries to profit from the mysterious, otherworldly phenomenon.

programme.title: The Avengers
programme.desc: When Thor's evil brother, Loki (Tom Hiddleston), gains access to the unlimited power of the energy cube called the Tesseract, Nick Fury (Samuel L. Jackson), director of S.H.I.E.L.D., initiates a superhero recruitment effort to defeat the unprecedented threat to Earth. Joining Fury's "dream team" are Iron Man (Robert Downey Jr.), Captain America (Chris Evans), the Hulk (Mark Ruffalo), Thor (Chris Hemsworth), the Black Widow (Scarlett Johansson) and Hawkeye (Jeremy Renner).

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: Upset about moving from the big city to a small town, young Zach Cooper (Dylan Minnette) finds a silver lining when he meets his beautiful neighbor Hannah (Odeya Rush). The teen is surprised to learn that Hannah's mysterious father is R.L. Stine (Jack Black), the famous author of the best-selling "Goosebumps" series. When Zach accidentally unleashes the monsters from the fantastic tales, it's up to Stine, his daughter and Cooper to return the beasts back to the books where they belong.

programme.title: Drag Me to Hell
programme.desc: Christine Brown has a loving boyfriend and a good job at a Los Angeles bank. Her heavenly life becomes hellish when, in an effort to impress her boss, she denies an old woman's request for an extension on her home loan. In retaliation, the crone places a curse on Christine, threatening her soul with eternal damnation. Christine seeks a psychic's help to break the curse, but the price to save her soul may be more than she can pay.

programme.title: The Blair Witch Project
programme.desc: Found video footage tells the tale of three film students (Heather Donahue, Joshua Leonard, Michael C. Williams) who've traveled to a small town to collect documentary footage about the Blair Witch, a legendary local murderer. Over the course of several days, the students interview townspeople and gather clues to support the tale's veracity. But the project takes a frightening turn when the students lose their way in the woods and begin hearing horrific noises.

programme.title: Brightburn
programme.desc: After a difficult struggle with fertility, Tori Breyer's dreams of motherhood come true with the arrival of a mysterious baby boy. Brandon appears to be everything Tori and her husband, Kyle, ever wanted -- bright, talented and curious about the world. But as Brandon nears puberty, powerful darkness manifests within him, and Tori becomes consumed by terrible doubts about her son. Once Brandon begins to act on his twisted urges, those closest to him find themselves in grave danger.

programme.title: Horizon Line
programme.desc: Former couple Sara and Jackson board a single-engine plane for a routine and casual flight to their friend's tropical island wedding. However, within minutes after takeoff, their pilot suffers a fatal heart attack, leaving them with no idea where they are, and no clue how to land the plane. With nothing but miles of ocean and sky in every direction, and a terrifying storm that's about to envelop them, Sara and Jackson have only one shot -- and there's no going back.

programme.title: Firestarter
programme.desc: A couple desperately try to hide their daughter, Charlie, from a shadowy federal agency that wants to harness her unprecedented gift for turning fire into a weapon of mass destruction. Her father taught her how to defuse her power, but as Charlie turns 11, the fire becomes harder and harder to control. When a mysterious operative finally finds the family, he tries to seize Charlie once and for all -- but she has other plans.

programme.title: Silent House
programme.desc: Sarah (Elizabeth Olsen) is working with her father (Adam Trese) and uncle (Eric Sheffer Stevens) to renovate an old family home to prepare it for sale. Long vacant, the house has no utilities, forcing the trio to rely on battery-operated lanterns to light their way. Sarah becomes separated from her relatives and soon finds she is trapped inside the cabin, with no contact with the outside world. Panic turns to real terror as the young woman experiences events that become increasingly ominous.

programme.title: Nope
programme.desc: A man and his sister discover something sinister in the skies above their California horse ranch, while the owner of a nearby theme park tries to profit from the mysterious, otherworldly phenomenon.

programme.title: Winchester
programme.desc: The most haunted house in the world sits on an isolated stretch of land that's 50 miles outside of San Francisco. Built by Sarah Winchester, heiress to the Winchester fortune, it stands seven stories tall and contains hundreds of rooms. To an outsider, it looks like a monstrous monument to a disturbed woman's madness. But Sarah's actually building a prison, an asylum for hundreds of vengeful ghosts -- and the most terrifying among them have a score to settle with the Winchesters.

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: Photographer Adam Stanheight (Leigh Whannell) and oncologist Lawrence Gordon (Cary Elwes) regain consciousness while chained to pipes at either end of a filthy bathroom. As the two men realize they've been trapped by a sadistic serial killer nicknamed "Jigsaw" and must complete his perverse puzzle to live, flashbacks relate the fates of his previous victims. Meanwhile, Dr. Gordon's wife (Monica Potter) and young daughter (Makenzie Vega) are forced to watch his torture via closed-circuit video.

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: Political pressure mounts to install a system of accountability when the actions of the Avengers lead to collateral damage. The new status quo deeply divides members of the team. Captain America (Chris Evans) believes superheroes should remain free to defend humanity without government interference. Iron Man (Robert Downey Jr.) sharply disagrees and supports oversight. As the debate escalates into an all-out feud, Black Widow (Scarlett Johansson) and Hawkeye (Jeremy Renner) must pick a side.

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: Two centuries after Dr. Frankenstein assembles and reanimates his creature, Adam (Aaron Eckhart) is still living. He becomes embroiled in a war between two immortal races: gargoyles, the traditional protectors of mankind, and evil demons. Since Adam is neither human nor demon, gargoyle Queen Leonore (Miranda Otto) and demon Prince Naberius (Bill Nighy) each want him for their own purposes. It is up to Adam to discover his inner humanity and the reason for his continued existence.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: After a virus turns most people into zombies, the world's surviving humans remain locked in an ongoing battle against the hungry undead. Four survivors -- Tallahassee (Woody Harrelson) and his cohorts Columbus (Jesse Eisenberg), Wichita (Emma Stone) and Little Rock (Abigail Breslin) -- abide by a list of survival rules and zombie-killing strategies as they make their way toward a rumored safe haven in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Avengers: Infinity War
programme.desc: Iron Man, Thor, the Hulk and the rest of the Avengers unite to battle their most powerful enemy yet -- the evil Thanos. On a mission to collect all six Infinity Stones, Thanos plans to use the artifacts to inflict his twisted will on reality. The fate of the planet and existence itself has never been more uncertain as everything the Avengers have fought for has led up to this moment.

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: On the hunt for the twisted vigilante and serial killer Jigsaw, Detective Eric Matthews and his team must apprehend the elusive murderer to rescue eight people trapped in an abandoned house, before they succumb to his torturous and murderous games. One twist to this task is that Matthews' own son, Daniel, is among the eight people Jigsaw has chosen to test for their lack of morality. With nerve gas pumping through the house, every second counts.

programme.title: The Replacements

Knowing that he won't survive more than a few minutes in prison on his own, James turns to Darnell, a Black businessman who's never even had a parking ticket, for help. As Darnell puts James through the wringer, both learn that they were wrong about many things, including each other.

programme.title: Live: What Would You Do?
programme.desc: Using hidden cameras, host John Quiñones observes and comments on how ordinary people behave when they are confronted with dilemmas that require them either to take action or to walk by and mind their own business. Various scenarios are created that force people to make split-second -- and often surprising -- decisions, and variations of the situation (such as changing the genders, races or clothing of the people involved) are often featured to see if different reactions are elicited. Examples of situations on the show include a waitress being harassed by her boss, and a drunken valet trying to park cars.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Jones are called away from a hated team-building exercise to investigate an explosion at a haulage yard run by Territorial Army officer Matt Parkes and his ruthless son James. James is involved in some shady activities, but is he capable of arson or murder? When a body turns up, there are plenty of other suspects on the scene, including a peace protestor and a host of trained killers at the TA.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Two couples vanish without trace from the village of Monks Barton amid rumours of witchcraft and haunted woods. Flamboyant psychic Cyrus LeVanu clashes with pompous cleric Wallace Stone as a body is found, while other villagers seem to be caught up in a stolen antiques racket.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The residents of Milton Cross, a feudal estate with a church, farms, houses and acres of land, depend on lord of the manor Edward Milton for their livelihoods. When Sonia Woodley is stabbed in the churchyard two years after the death of her abusive husband Gerald, Barnaby and Jones investigate - and the village starts to reveal its secrets.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby joins a trip from Midsomer Parva to Brighton because he's suspicious about a deal to buy coastal land for holiday chalets by Causton's mayor. Also against the proposal is Lady Matilda William, a descendant of a French knight Sir Richard Guillaume, whose son Richard will be the last of the line because of brain damage sustained in an attack 20 years ago.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Trouble seems to be brewing in the pretty village of Ford Florey when a tract of waste ground dubbed `the Swamp' becomes the focus of a land dispute between two old agricultural families and a band of travellers. Things get nasty at the town's annual fair when a woman is shot for real during a shootout reconstruction at the Wild West show. Barnaby and Jones uncover a series of seething grudges within the village.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: After Joyce Barnaby swerves off the road into a ditch, believing she has hit someone, the body of a librarian is found in a nearby cemetery. Amid stories of ghosts and haunted buildings, can DCI Tom Barnaby convince his wife that she is not to blame - and at the same time identify the real killer on the loose in March Magna?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: During a masterclass for talented young musicians held by famous pianist Sir Michael Fielding, prodigy Zoe Stock is shocked to witness a woman drowning in the river, leaving a baby on the bank. When police arrive, however, there is no sign of the woman or her child. DCI Tom Barnaby is struck by the similarity of the reported drowning to a mysterious case from 20 years ago.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Betrayal, infidelity and blackmail fester as plans to re-enact a Victorian prizefight turn nasty - and even DCI Barnaby finds his judgement clouded by an old friend. Midsomer Morchard welcomes back local boxer John Kinsella from his world title fight victory in New York. Meanwhile, Kinsella's ruthless and controlling promoter Frank Bishop goes to see solicitor Giles Braithwaite, only to find the lawyer dead.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A planning dispute turns to murder after a leading light in the Midsomer Conservation Society suspects her neighbours are involved in a money-making development scam. Political wrangling, burglaries and sexual liaisons abound in picturesque Great Pelfe - but why is someone driven to start killing? Barnaby and Jones investigate.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: With his birthday approaching, Barnaby reluctantly accompanies Joyce on a spa weekend to Swavely Manor, but as he attempts to relax, a woman is found dead in the flotation chamber. Abandoning the treatment to investigate, Barnaby uncovers a feud between neighbours, money wrangles and the mystery of a half-written novel. After another gruesome discovery, the truth gradually emerges.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders

programme.desc: Steve Harvey assumes the hosting duties for this daytime game show in which five members of one family are pitted against five members of another family. programme.title: C dans l'air
programme.desc: Du lundi au samedi, "C dans l'air" donne les clés pour comprendre dans sa globalité un événement ou un sujet d'actualité de première importance, en permettant aux téléspectateurs d'intervenir dans le débat ou de poser des questions par SMS ou Internet. Plusieurs reportages illustrent le sujet et des spécialistes, sur le plateau, l'éclairent de leurs réflexions.

programme.title: Un si grand soleil
programme.desc: Les efforts d'Eliott commencent à payer. De son côté, Florent fait face à un cas de divorce compliqué, tandis que Margot doit affronter Claudine.

programme.title: Tout le monde veut prendre sa place
Vestiaires
programme.desc: Romy et Orson, deux nageurs handicapés, se retrouvent chaque semaine pour leur entraînement. Ils côtoient d'autres nageurs, dont Caro qui n'a pas de mémoire, pour des moments d'humour partagés. Tournée dans un club handisport de Marseille, une série courte et tonique qui a remporté un vif succès.

programme.title: Alice et le maire
programme.desc: Après trente ans de mandat, Paul Théraneau, maire socialiste de Lyon, est fatigué. Il n'est pas encore tombé dans le cynisme, mais en panne d'idées, il est en pilotage automatique. Il tente de raviver la flamme de l'engagement politique en faisant appel à Alice Heimann, une jeune et brillante philosophe. Auprès d'elle, il commence à retrouver la foi. Au contact de Théraneau, elle perd quelques certitudes sur l'exercice du pouvoir. La jeune femme se révèle vite indispensable, suscitant des jalousies dans l'entourage du maire...

programme.title: Le dessous des cartes
programme.desc: Autrefois réservé aux grandes puissances, l'espace est devenu le terrain d'un nouvel affrontement entre des entrepreneurs milliardaires aux projets parfois délirants.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou
programme.desc: Avec sa poupée en laine Rikitou, Malisha, petite fille de 10 ans, part en quête de la pierre magique Koka Kitoumbou qui transforme tout en confiseries.

programme.title: La petite Pokou
programme.desc: Pokou, six ans, est une princesse qui adore apprendre. Elle étudie le Komian, une méthode initiatique africaine. Jour après jour, elle découvre les plantes traditionnelles, la guérison des maladies et bien d'autres sciences. Mais cet enseignement est plein d'obstacles et d'adversaires, tels que Kongouê Bian, un puissant mystique.

programme.title: Les grandes grandes vacances
programme.desc: texte complété après conférence de presse et explications de l'auteure, Delphine Maury. Nat.

programme.title: Mise au point
programme.desc: Les meilleurs reportages de " Mise au point ", l'émission qui revisite à sa manière l'actualité nationale et internationale.

programme.title: Par 4 chemins
programme.desc: Voyage sensible et singulier, des vignes de la Côte-d'Or aux vallons du Morvan, en passant par Vézelay et les prairies bressanes. Une ode au territoire, à celles et ceux qui le façonnent et le racontent.

programme.title: 64 minutes, le monde en français, 1re partie
programme.desc: Le Monde en Français met l'accent sur l'actualité internationale, l'actualité francophone, culturelle, politique, économique, sociale et sociétale.

programme.title: 64 minutes, le monde en français: 2e partie
programme.desc: Le Monde en Français met l'accent sur l'actualité internationale, l'actualité francophone, culturelle, politique, économique, sociale et sociétale.

programme.title: L'invité
programme.desc: Rencontre avec des artistes, des écrivains, des acteurs et tous ceux qui font vibrer notre époque. "L'invité" est le rendez-vous des personnalités qui font l'actualité.

programme.title: Un si grand soleil
programme.desc: Eliott donne un tuyau à Manu et réussit un gros coup au passage. Pendant ce temps, Florent a de plus en plus de mal à gérer un client difficile.

programme.title: Le divan du monde
programme.desc: Psychiatre atypique, indépendant et agréé par la DDASS, le docteur Georges Federmann reçoit dans son cabinet strasbourgeois des patients français et étrangers, originaires du quartier ou des environs, demandeurs d'asile ou clandestins. Tous viennent chercher refuge et une oreille attentive en confiant leur peine à vivre, leurs troubles profonds ou leurs histoires difficiles. Ils trouvent face à eux un docteur décomplexé et à l'écoute assidue, peu avare en réparties stimulantes...

programme.title: L'actu news
programme.desc: Le journal de TVMONACO : les temps forts de la semaine.

programme.title: La montagne
programme.desc: Présent dans les Alpes pour la présentation d'un projet dans le cadre de son travail, Pierre, un ingénieur parisien, décide de rester sur place et laisse ses collègues retourner à Paris sans lui. Ebloui par ces paysages grandioses, il se procure vite le matériel nécessaire pour effectuer une randonnée et part à la conquête des sommets. Une fois arrivé, il ne souhaite plus redescendre et fait la connaissance d'une autre passionnée d'alpinisme, Léa, cheffe cuisinière. Il est alors témoin d'un phénomène étrange : des lueurs énigmatiques scintillent dans la nuit. Profondément intrigué, l'ingénieur souhaite en connaître l'origine...

programme.title: La montagne
programme.desc: Présent dans les Alpes pour la présentation d'un projet dans le cadre de son travail, Pierre, un ingénieur parisien, décide de rester sur place et laisse ses collègues retourner à Paris sans lui. Ebloui par ces paysages grandioses, il se procure vite le matériel nécessaire pour effectuer une randonnée et part à la conquête des sommets. Une fois arrivé, il ne souhaite plus redescendre et fait la connaissance d'une autre passionnée d'alpinisme, Léa, cheffe cuisinière. Il est alors témoin d'un phénomène étrange : des lueurs énigmatiques scintillent dans la nuit. Profondément intrigué, l'ingénieur souhaite en connaître l'origine...

programme.title: Lebowitz contre Lebowitz
programme.desc: Paule Lebowitz, brillante avocate, a consacré sa vie au cabinet qu'elle a créé avec son ex-mari, Simon Lebowitz. Un jour qu'elle savoure un succès de plaidoirie, elle apprend qu'Irène, une jeune associée qu'elle avait recrutée comme stagiaire, a épousé Simon il y a six mois, en toute discrétion. Folle de rage, Paule va trouver son ex-compagnon pour lui exprimer sa colère. Simon fait une crise cardiaque et décède peu après. Le destin des deux avocates est désormais scellé : Irène hérite des parts de son mari, les deux avocates sont contraintes d'officier sous le même toit et de partager le même nom. Clémentine Célarié (Les Randonneuses) et Caroline Anglade (Sauver Lisa, La vie rêvée des autres) se crêpent allègrement le chignon dans cette série qui alterne sujets sérieux et fantaisie.

programme.title: Lebowitz contre Lebowitz
programme.desc: Paule Lebowitz, brillante avocate, a consacré sa vie au cabinet qu'elle a créé avec son ex-mari, Simon Lebowitz. Un jour qu'elle savoure un succès de plaidoirie, elle apprend qu'Irène, une jeune associée qu'elle avait recrutée comme stagiaire, a épousé Simon il y a six mois, en toute discrétion. Folle de rage, Paule va trouver son ex-compagnon pour lui exprimer sa colère. Simon fait une crise cardiaque et décède peu après. Le destin des deux avocates est désormais scellé : Irène hérite des parts de son mari, les deux avocates sont contraintes d'officier sous le même toit et de partager le même nom. Clémentine Célarié (Les Randonneuses) et Caroline Anglade (Sauver Lisa, La vie rêvée des autres) se crêpent allègrement le chignon dans cette série qui alterne sujets sérieux et fantaisie.

programme.title: Le court du jour : femmes de science
programme.desc: Neuroscientifique chargée de recherche à l'Inserm, Cécile Charrier est cheffe d'équipe au sein de l'Institut de biologie de l'Ecole normale supérieure à Paris.

programme.title: Version française
programme.desc: À Essoyes, visite de la maison-atelier du peintre Pierre-Auguste Renoir. Au coeur des ateliers du 19M, rencontre avec Priscilla Royer, directrice artistique de l'emblématique chapellerie Maison Michel Paris. La créatrice Chitose Abe puise dans ses archives pour les réinventer. L'ébéniste Aurélie Boyer restaure les meubles et objets en bois.

programme.title: Suisse en scène
programme.desc: Chaque semaine, "Suisse en scène" propose un entretien avec une personnalité issue de la scène culturelle suisse. L'occasion de revenir, en paroles et en images, sur son parcours et sur les principes qui sous-tendent son travail.

programme.title: Allô tribunal
programme.desc: A Bissauville, la capitale du Zamboland, le système judiciaire se veut exemplaire. Intransigeante, la juge Savhera s'attèle donc à faire scrupuleusement appliquer la loi. Et face à une salle d'audience surchauffée, elle peut compter sur l'officier Wanderma pour faire respecter l'ordre. Une série de prétoire qui met en avant les règle de la société et de la vie en commun. Un regard circulaire sur la société africaine contemporaine.

programme.title: Klass
programme.desc: Un enseignant, une classe, des questions ! Un concept simple pour des interrogations parfois complexes d'élèves de primaire. Ces derniers sont hors-champ. L'instit, lui, a trois minutes pour répondre à des questions touchant de près ou de loin à l'économie.

programme.title: Ça, maintenant !
programme.desc: Toutes disciplines confondues, performances d'artistes de la scène suisse romande.

programme.title: VF
programme.desc: Mode, design, gastronomie, art de vivre, chaque petit reportage, extrait du magazine Version française, est une illustration du chic à la française.

programme.title: Merci Professeur
programme.desc: Bernard Cerquiglini décortique les curiosités de la langue française et détaille les règles de grammaire, d'accords, ou les tournures de phrases parfois curieuses.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est dans la boîte !
programme.desc: Chaque jour, Rocky et Lily reçoivent une nouvelle boîte sur le plateau. Mais que contient-elle ? Un objet toujours surprenant qui les amène à s'intéresser à des sujets très divers, allant de l'histoire des emojis au tri des poubelles ou à la musique électro.

programme.title: Partie de campagne
programme.desc: Au beau milieu des champs, une bande d'enfant vit au petit village de Bellefontaine. Raphaël, Lina, P'tit Pied et Grande Perche remplissent leur quotidien d'aventures trépidantes grâce à une imagination sans limites.

programme.title: Edmond et Lucy
programme.desc: Edmond l'écureuil et Lucy l'oursonne sont élevés comme frère et soeur dans un majestueux châtaignier, sorte de cité radieuse de la forêt. Tous deux jouent et grandissent au coeur de la nature, répondent aux énigmes que celle-ci soulève et vivent des aventures au grand air en compagnie de leur famille et amis : Edouard, papa d'Edmond, Mima la grand-mère, Georges Hibou, les souris Polka et Hortense, Mitzi la petite chauve-souris et la Chose.

programme.title: Edmond et Lucy
programme.desc: Edmond l'écureuil et Lucy l'oursonne sont élevés comme frère et soeur dans un majestueux châtaignier, sorte de cité radieuse de la forêt. Tous deux jouent et grandissent au coeur de la nature, répondent aux énigmes que celle-ci soulève et vivent des aventures au grand air en compagnie de leur famille et amis : Edouard, papa d'Edmond, Mima la grand-mère, Georges Hibou, les souris Polka et Hortense, Mitzi la petite chauve-souris et la Chose.

programme.title: Dessine les animaux avec Koumi
programme.desc: Koumi, gaie et espiègle, rêve de connaître tous les animaux du monde. En plus de ça, elle adore dessiner. Dans chaque épisode, elle explique comment bien dessiner les animaux.

programme.title: Billy, le hamster cowboy
programme.desc: Billy, un hamster très malin, vit avec son papa dans un ranch en rondins, au coeur de l'Ouest sauvage, premier canyon à gauche avant la montagne.

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-moi ta maison
programme.desc: Viola débute sa visite dans une chambre d'hôtel de 17 mètres carrés puis découvre un ancien bâtiment militaire classé monument historique et reconverti en maison d'habitation.

programme.title: En vadrouille
programme.desc: Le temps d'une émission, la famille Glénat ouvre les portes de ses éditions installées dans le couvent Sainte-Cécile, situé au coeur de Grenoble.

programme.title: Le miracle suisse
programme.desc: L'émission qui vous explique (enfin) les secrets du bien-être helvétique et vous donne les clefs de la \" suisse attitude \".

programme.title: Donner l'goût
programme.desc: Hélène rencontre Mitch et Boom, l'équipe derrière La Belle Tonki, un restaurant vietnamien de Montréal. La mère de Mitch lui révèle les secrets d'une soupe phó vietnamienne.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: Une émission consacrée à la création française et à la mode. Elle dresse le portrait de créateurs passionnés et analyse des tendances, celles d'aujourd'hui ou celles qui ont profondément marqué l'histoire de la mode.

programme.title: C dans l'air
programme.desc: Du lundi au samedi, "C dans l'air" donne les clés pour comprendre dans sa globalité un événement ou un sujet d'actualité de première importance, en permettant aux téléspectateurs d'intervenir dans le débat ou de poser des questions par SMS ou Internet. programme.title: Un si grand soleil
programme.desc: Eliott donne un tuyau à Manu et réussit un gros coup au passage. Pendant ce temps, Florent a de plus en plus de mal à gérer un client difficile.

programme.title: Tout le monde veut prendre sa place
Vestiaires

Ils côtoient d'autres nageurs, dont Caro qui n'a pas de mémoire, pour des moments d'humour partagés. Tournée dans un club handisport de Marseille, une série courte et tonique qui a remporté un vif succès.

programme.title: Rivages
programme.desc: Après le naufrage inexplicable d'un chalutier et la disparition de son équipage, Abigail, une océanographe de l'Ifremer, est envoyée à Fécamp, sa commune natale, pour enquêter. La jeune femme avait quitté la petite ville des années plus tôt à la suite d'un drame familial. A son arrivée, elle doit faire face aux tensions qui opposent les autorités, à la fois aux pêcheurs et aux écologistes. Alors que les phénomènes mystérieux se multiplient, Abigail comprend qu'une créature inconnue pourrait bien hanter les fonds marins. Dans le rôle d'Abigail, Fleur Geffrier - "Les espions de la terreur" - est épaulée par quelques valeurs sûres, Thierry Godard et Jean-Marc Barr en tête.

programme.title: L'écologie en action
